translation.en: I'm sorry that your order is running late.
translation.zh: 很抱歉，您点的餐可能会晚到一会。
translation.source: I'm sorry that your order is running late.
translation.medium: 对不起，您的订单迟到了。
translation.reference: 很抱歉，您点的餐可能会晚到一会。

translation.en: I've looked into it and I can see that your area is currently having a high volumes of order that is why they were assigning a rider for your order.
translation.zh: 我已经问过了，目前您所在地区的订单量很大，所以他们为您的订单指派了一名骑手。
translation.source: I've looked into it and I can see that your area is currently having a high volumes of order that is why they were assigning a rider for your order.
translation.medium: 我已經查看了一下，我可以看到您所在的地區目前有大量的訂單，這就是為什麼他們會指派一位騎手為您的訂單服務的原因。
translation.reference: 我已经问过了，目前您所在地区的订单量很大，所以他们为您的订单指派了一名骑手。

translation.en: But just an update there is now a rider that has confirmed its arrival at the restaurant.
translation.zh: 最新消息是，现在有一名骑手确认他已经到达餐厅。
translation.source: But just an update there is now a rider that has confirmed its arrival at the restaurant.
translation.medium: 但是有一位骑手已经确认到达餐厅了。
translation.reference: 最新消息是，现在有一名骑手确认他已经到达餐厅。

translation.en: Please note that if you pay for expedited shipping, the handling time for the order is still 3 business days.
translation.zh: 请注意，即使您支付了加急运输的费用，处理订单的时间仍然是 3 个工作日。
translation.source: Please note that if you pay for expedited shipping, the handling time for the order is still 3 business days.
translation.medium: 请注意，如果您支付加急运费，订单的处理时间仍然是3个工作日。
translation.reference: 请注意，即使您支付了加急运输的费用，处理订单的时间仍然是 3 个工作日。

translation.en: Whenever the item ships, it will be shipped by the expedited service if you have paid for it.
translation.zh: 不过，如果您支付了此费用，无论何时发货，都将通过加急服务运输。
translation.source: Whenever the item ships, it will be shipped by the expedited service if you have paid for it.
translation.medium: 當貨物出貨時，如果你已經付款，它將會以加急服務發貨。
translation.reference: 不过，如果您支付了此费用，无论何时发货，都将通过加急服务运输。

translation.en: Business days do not include Saturdays, Sundays and Federal Holidays.
translation.zh: 工作日不包括周六、周日和联邦假日。
translation.source: Business days do not include Saturdays, Sundays and Federal Holidays.
translation.medium: 商业日不包括星期六、星期日和联邦假日。
translation.reference: 工作日不包括周六、周日和联邦假日。

translation.en: International shipments are usually delivered within 11 to 22 business days, depending on the time it takes to clear customs.
translation.zh: 国际包裹通常在 11 至 22 个工作日内送达，具体时间取决于清关时间。
translation.source: International shipments are usually delivered within 11 to 22 business days, depending on the time it takes to clear customs.
translation.medium: 国际运输通常在11至22个工作日内交付，具体取决于清关所需的时间。
translation.reference: 国际包裹通常在 11 至 22 个工作日内送达，具体时间取决于清关时间。

translation.en: Shipping Rate - Free Standard Shipping if shown as free in the product
translation.zh: 运费 - 如果产品中显示为免费，则提供免费标准快递服务
translation.source: Shipping Rate - Free Standard Shipping if shown as free in the product
translation.medium: 如果产品中显示为免费，则免费标准运费
translation.reference: 运费 - 如果产品中显示为免费，则提供免费标准快递服务

translation.en: Note 1: Some countries may charge additional fees at local customs.
translation.zh: 注 1：有些国家的海关可能会收取额外费用。
translation.source: Note 1: Some countries may charge additional fees at local customs.
translation.medium: 在某些国家，当地海关可能会收取额外的费用。
translation.reference: 注 1：有些国家的海关可能会收取额外费用。

translation.en: Please call your customs, or google it for exact charges.
translation.zh: 请致电海关或在 Google 上搜索，以了解确切的费用。
translation.source: Please call your customs, or google it for exact charges.
translation.medium: 请联系您的海关，或者上网搜索准确的收费标准。
translation.reference: 请致电海关或在 Google 上搜索，以了解确切的费用。

translation.en: Note 2: Any customs charges or taxes in the buyer's country will be paid by the buyer and we will not reimburse any amount whatsoever.
translation.zh: 注 2：买方国家收取的任何海关费用或税费将由买方支付，我们不会报销任何金额。
translation.source: Note 2: Any customs charges or taxes in the buyer's country will be paid by the buyer and we will not reimburse any amount whatsoever.
translation.medium: 注意2：买家所在国家的任何关税或税收由买家承担，我们不会报销任何金额。
translation.reference: 注 2：买方国家收取的任何海关费用或税费将由买方支付，我们不会报销任何金额。

translation.en: We guarantee your satisfaction and offer a 30-day money-back return (or exchange) policy.
translation.zh: 为了让您满意，我们提供 30 天的退款（或换货）政策。
translation.source: We guarantee your satisfaction and offer a 30-day money-back return (or exchange) policy.
translation.medium: 我们保证您的满意，并提供30天退款（或换货）政策。
translation.reference: 为了让您满意，我们提供 30 天的退款（或换货）政策。

translation.en: If for any reason you are unsatisfied with your purchase, please contact us first before you leave negative/neutral feedback so that we can make things right!
translation.zh: 如果您因为任何原因对购买的商品不满意，请在给予中差评之前先联系我们，我们会帮您解决问题！
translation.source: If for any reason you are unsatisfied with your purchase, please contact us first before you leave negative/neutral feedback so that we can make things right!
translation.medium: 如果您對購買的商品不滿意，請先與我們聯繫，再給予消極/中立的反饋，以便我們能夠為您解決問題！
translation.reference: 如果您因为任何原因对购买的商品不满意，请在给予中差评之前先联系我们，我们会帮您解决问题！

translation.en: You have 30 days to return the item from the day it was ordered.
translation.zh: 订购之日起 30 天内可以退货。
translation.source: You have 30 days to return the item from the day it was ordered.
translation.medium: 你有30天的时间从订购日起退回该物品。
translation.reference: 订购之日起 30 天内可以退货。

translation.en: You must furnish tracking numbers once you ship the item back to us.
translation.zh: 如果您退货，请您提供快递单号。
translation.source: You must furnish tracking numbers once you ship the item back to us.
translation.medium: 你必须在将物品返还给我们时提供跟踪号码。
translation.reference: 如果您退货，请您提供快递单号。

translation.en: IF the PRODUCT is DAMAGED or TAGS ARE REMOVED or USED Or WORN by you, then the RETURN IS INVALID.
translation.zh: 如果产品损坏、标签已剪掉、用过或有磨损，则不可退货。
translation.source: IF the PRODUCT is DAMAGED or TAGS ARE REMOVED or USED Or WORN by you, then the RETURN IS INVALID.
translation.medium: 如果商品損壞或標籤被移除或被您使用或穿著，則退貨無效。
translation.reference: 如果产品损坏、标签已剪掉、用过或有磨损，则不可退货。

translation.en: Return Duty in the Buyer's country if levied has to be paid by the buyer.
translation.zh: 退货时在买方国家产生的关税由买方支付。
translation.source: Return Duty in the Buyer's country if levied has to be paid by the buyer.
translation.medium: 买方如果征收归还关税，则买方必须支付。
translation.reference: 退货时在买方国家产生的关税由买方支付。

translation.en: We take absolute care that precious jewels are packed well so that there is no damage to the product.
translation.zh: 对于贵重的珠宝，我们会细心打包，以免损坏产品。
translation.source: We take absolute care that precious jewels are packed well so that there is no damage to the product.

translation.en: They are delivered in an elegant box, ideal for gifting to someone special.

translation.source: They are delivered in an elegant box, ideal for gifting to someone special.

translation.reference: 珠宝会装在一个高档盒子里，非常适合送给特别的人。

translation.en: Feedback & DSRs (Detailed Seller Ratings).
translation.zh: 反馈和 DSR（卖方详细评级）。
translation.source: Feedback & DSRs (Detailed Seller Ratings).
translation.medium: 反馈和DSR（详细的卖家评级）。
translation.reference: 反馈和 DSR（卖方详细评级）。

translation.en: “Our priority is to have 100% customer satisfaction and ensure that you have a great shopping experience.
translation.zh: “让顾客 100% 满意，为顾客提供出色的购物体验，是我们的第一要务。
translation.source: “Our priority is to have 100% customer satisfaction and ensure that you have a great shopping experience.
translation.medium: 我们的首要任务是达到100%的客户满意度，确保您有一个很棒的购物体验。
translation.reference: “让顾客 100% 满意，为顾客提供出色的购物体验，是我们的第一要务。

translation.en: You can feel safe to trust us and please contact us should you have any question or comment.
translation.zh: 我们值得您信任，如果您有任何问题或意见，请联系我们。
translation.source: You can feel safe to trust us and please contact us should you have any question or comment.
translation.medium: 你可以放心地信任我们，如果你有任何问题或意见，请联系我们。
translation.reference: 我们值得您信任，如果您有任何问题或意见，请联系我们。

translation.en: We take the feedback you leave with utmost importance.
translation.zh: 我们非常重视您的反馈。
translation.source: We take the feedback you leave with utmost importance.
translation.medium: 我们非常重视您留下的反馈。
translation.reference: 我们非常重视您的反馈。

translation.en: If for any reason you are dissatisfied or unhappy with our products or service, do first reach out to us and give us an opportunity to set things right.
translation.zh: 如果您因任何原因对我们的产品或服务不满意，请先联系我们，给我们一个解决问题的机会。
translation.source: If for any reason you are dissatisfied or unhappy with our products or service, do first reach out to us and give us an opportunity to set things right.

translation.reference: 如果您因任何原因对我们的产品或服务不满意，请先联系我们，给我们一个解决问题的机会。

translation.en: We do not want any negative feedback rating and these cannot be changed once given, so do give us an opportunity to provide a faster resolution for any issue you may face.”
translation.zh: 我们不想收到任何差评，而且差评是不可更改的，所以请给我们一个机会，我们会很快解决您遇到的问题。”
translation.source: We do not want any negative feedback rating and these cannot be changed once given, so do give us an opportunity to provide a faster resolution for any issue you may face.”
translation.medium: 我们不希望收到任何负面反馈评级，一旦给出，这些评级是不能更改的，所以请给我们一个机会，为您可能遇到的任何问题提供更快的解决方案。
translation.reference: 我们不想收到任何差评，而且差评是不可更改的，所以请给我们一个机会，我们会很快解决您遇到的问题。”

translation.zh: 我们专门从事钻石戒指、订婚戒指、结婚戒指、钻石耳环、婚礼项链、吊坠和单颗祼钻以及许多礼品的定制。
translation.source: We specialise in Custom Made Solitaire Diamond Rings, Engagement Rings, Wedding Bands, Diamond Earrings, Wedding Necklace, Pendants and Loose Diamond Solitaire along with many gift items.
translation.medium: 我们专业制作定制单钻戒指、订婚戒指、结婚戒指、钻石耳环、婚礼项链、吊坠和单钻钻石，以及许多礼品项目。

translation.en: We have also introduced Diamond jewelry in 92.5 Sterling Silver.
translation.zh: 我们还推出了 92.5 纯银钻石首饰。
translation.source: We have also introduced Diamond jewelry in 92.5 Sterling Silver.
translation.medium: 我们也推出了92.5纯银镶钻石珠宝。
translation.reference: 我们还推出了 92.5 纯银钻石首饰。

translation.en: Our range includes Rings, Earrings, Pendants and Mangalsutra.
translation.zh: 我们的产品包括戒指、耳环、吊坠和 Mangalsutra。
translation.source: Our range includes Rings, Earrings, Pendants and Mangalsutra.
translation.medium: 我们的产品包括戒指、耳环、吊坠和婚纱。
translation.reference: 我们的产品包括戒指、耳环、吊坠和 Mangalsutra。

translation.en: We have over 6 decades of experience in Jewelry Manufacturing.
translation.zh: 我们拥有超过 60 年的珠宝制作经验。
translation.source: We have over 6 decades of experience in Jewelry Manufacturing.
translation.medium: 我们在珠宝制造业拥有超过60年的经验。
translation.reference: 我们拥有超过 60 年的珠宝制作经验。

translation.en: We also deal in wholesale and export of 14 K, 18 K Handmade and Machine-made Gold Diamond Jewelry.
translation.zh: 我们还经营 14 K、18 K 手工和机制黄金钻石首饰的批发和出口业务。
translation.source: We also deal in wholesale and export of 14 K, 18 K Handmade and Machine-made Gold Diamond Jewelry.
translation.medium: 我们还经营14K、18K手工和机制黄金钻石珠宝的批发和出口业务。
translation.reference: 我们还经营 14 K、18 K 手工和机制黄金钻石首饰的批发和出口业务。

translation.en: Libya: plan for presidential election on 24 December close to collapse
translation.zh: 利比亚：12 月 24 日选举总统的计划近乎流产
translation.source: Libya: plan for presidential election on 24 December close to collapse
translation.medium: 利比亚：12月24日举行总统选举的计划濒临崩溃
translation.reference: 利比亚：12 月 24 日选举总统的计划近乎流产

translation.en: The chances of Libya staging its first presidential elections on the long planned date of 24 December appeared close to collapse on Sunday after the body overseeing the vote said it was unable to announce the the approved candidates because of continued legal doubts.
translation.zh: 周日，利比亚计划了很久的 12 月 24 日举行首次总统选举的可能性似乎接近破灭，此前，监督投票的机构表示，由于法律方面仍存在疑问，无法宣布批准的候选人。
translation.source: The chances of Libya staging its first presidential elections on the long planned date of 24 December appeared close to collapse on Sunday after the body overseeing the vote said it was unable to announce the the approved candidates because of continued legal doubts.
translation.medium: 周日，由于仍存在法律疑虑，监督投票的机构未能宣布批准的候选人，利比亚按计划于12月24日举行首次总统选举的机会似乎濒临崩溃。
translation.reference: 周日，利比亚计划了很久的 12 月 24 日举行首次总统选举的可能性似乎接近破灭，此前，监督投票的机构表示，由于法律方面仍存在疑问，无法宣布批准的候选人。

translation.en: With the elections less than a fortnight away and virtually no time for campaigning, a postponement would represent a bitter blow to the international community's hopes of reuniting the deeply divided country.
translation.zh: 在距离选举不到两周、几乎没有竞选时间的情况下，推迟选举对国际社会抱有的重新统一这个严重分裂国家的希望是个沉重的打击。
translation.source: With the elections less than a fortnight away and virtually no time for campaigning, a postponement would represent a bitter blow to the international community's hopes of reuniting the deeply divided country.
translation.medium: 随着选举不到两周就要到来，几乎没有时间进行竞选活动，推迟将是对国际社会希望重新统一这个深刻分裂的国家的沉重打击。
translation.reference: 在距离选举不到两周、几乎没有竞选时间的情况下，推迟选举对国际社会抱有的重新统一这个严重分裂国家的希望是个沉重的打击。

translation.en: Foreign powers will also fear the overall momentum towards democracy could dissipate.
translation.zh: 外国势力也会担心民主的整体势头会消失。
translation.source: Foreign powers will also fear the overall momentum towards democracy could dissipate.
translation.medium: 外国势力也会担心整体民主势头可能会消退。
translation.reference: 外国势力也会担心民主的整体势头会消失。

translation.en: In the short term they will have to agree whether or not the interim government continues in order to fill the political vacuum and prevent a return to civil war.
translation.zh: 他们必须在短时间内就临时政府是否继续存在达成一致，以填补政治真空并防止内战重新爆发。
translation.source: In the short term they will have to agree whether or not the interim government continues in order to fill the political vacuum and prevent a return to civil war.
translation.medium: 他们必须在短期内就是否继续暂时政府达成一致，以填补政治真空，防止再次爆发内战。
translation.reference: 他们必须在短时间内就临时政府是否继续存在达成一致，以填补政治真空并防止内战重新爆发。

translation.en: A series of court rulings have overturned the Libyan electoral commission's decisions to block high-profile figures including Saif al-Islam Gaddafi, the son of the former dictator, from standing for the presidency.
translation.zh: 一系列法庭裁决推翻了利比亚选举委员会阻止包括前独裁者的儿子赛义夫•伊斯兰•卡扎菲 (Saif al-Islam Gaddafi) 在内的知名人物竞选总统的决定。
translation.source: A series of court rulings have overturned the Libyan electoral commission's decisions to block high-profile figures including Saif al-Islam Gaddafi, the son of the former dictator, from standing for the presidency.
translation.medium: 法院的一系列裁决推翻了利比亚选举委员会拒绝让前独裁者的儿子赛义夫·卡扎菲参加总统竞选的决定。
translation.reference: 一系列法庭裁决推翻了利比亚选举委员会阻止包括前独裁者的儿子赛义夫•伊斯兰•卡扎菲 (Saif al-Islam Gaddafi) 在内的知名人物竞选总统的决定。

translation.en: The interim prime minister, Abdul Hamid Dbeibah and warlord Khalifa Haftar, the head of the self-styled Libyan National Army, have meanwhile been approved by the commission but subsequently appealed by other parties.
translation.zh: 与此同时，临时总理阿卜杜勒•哈米德•德贝巴赫 (Abdul Hamid Dbeibah) 和自封的利比亚国民军首领、军阀哈利法•哈夫塔 (Khalifa Haftar) 得到了委员会的批准，但随后受到了其他党派的上诉。
translation.source: The interim prime minister, Abdul Hamid Dbeibah and warlord Khalifa Haftar, the head of the self-styled Libyan National Army, have meanwhile been approved by the commission but subsequently appealed by other parties.
translation.medium: 临时总理阿卜杜勒·哈米德·德贝巴和军阀哈利法·哈夫塔尔，自封的利比亚国民军司令，已经被委员会批准，但随后受到其他各方的抗议。
translation.reference: 与此同时，临时总理阿卜杜勒•哈米德•德贝巴赫 (Abdul Hamid Dbeibah) 和自封的利比亚国民军首领、军阀哈利法•哈夫塔 (Khalifa Haftar) 得到了委员会的批准，但随后受到了其他党派的上诉。

translation.en: It said in a statement on Saturday it said could not announce the names of the approved candidates out of the nearly who 100 have applied because it was "keen to exhaust all means of litigation to ensure its decisions comply with issued judgements."
translation.zh: 该委员会在周六发表的一份声明中表示，不会公布近 100 名申请者中已经获得批准的候选人的名字，因为它“愿意用尽所有诉讼手段，以确保其决定符合已发布的判决”。
translation.source: It said in a statement on Saturday it said could not announce the names of the approved candidates out of the nearly who 100 have applied because it was "keen to exhaust all means of litigation to ensure its decisions comply with issued judgements."
translation.medium: 周六的声明中表示，由于“热切希望尽一切办法确保其决定符合发布的判决”，因此无法宣布近100名申请者中被批准的候选人的名字。
translation.reference: 该委员会在周六发表的一份声明中表示，不会公布近 100 名申请者中已经获得批准的候选人的名字，因为它“愿意用尽所有诉讼手段，以确保其决定符合已发布的判决”。

translation.en: Rival factions have accused each other of intimidating or bribing judicial officials to secure their reinstatement of their candidates, and the commission is looking to see if the decisions were valid.
translation.zh: 对立的派系互相指责对方胁迫或贿赂司法官员，以确保其候选人的复职，委员会正在观察这些决定是否有效。
translation.source: Rival factions have accused each other of intimidating or bribing judicial officials to secure their reinstatement of their candidates, and the commission is looking to see if the decisions were valid.
translation.medium: 竞争派别互相指责对方恐吓或贿赂司法官员以确保他们恢复他们候选人的资格，而委员会正在寻找这些决定是否有效。
translation.reference: 对立的派系互相指责对方胁迫或贿赂司法官员，以确保其候选人的复职，委员会正在观察这些决定是否有效。

translation.en: In the case of Dbeibah, he had pledged as a condition of becoming interim PM that he would not stand for election but has since argued in court that this was a moral pledge with no legal force.
translation.zh: 在德贝巴赫一案中，他曾承诺以不参加选举作为当选临时总理的条件，但他后来在法庭上辩称，这只是一个道德承诺，没有法律效力。
translation.source: In the case of Dbeibah, he had pledged as a condition of becoming interim PM that he would not stand for election but has since argued in court that this was a moral pledge with no legal force.
translation.medium: 就迪拜巴而言，他作为暂时总理的条件承诺不参加竞选，但此后他在法庭上辩称这是一个没有法律效力的道德承诺。
translation.reference: 在德贝巴赫一案中，他曾承诺以不参加选举作为当选临时总理的条件，但他后来在法庭上辩称，这只是一个道德承诺，没有法律效力。

translation.en: Saif Gaddafi was convicted in absentia in 2015 on war crimes charges for his part in fighting the revolution that toppled his father, Muammar Gaddafi.
translation.zh: 赛义夫·卡扎菲于 2015 年在未出庭的情况下被判战争罪，罪名是参与推翻他父亲穆阿迈尔·卡扎菲的革命。
translation.source: Saif Gaddafi was convicted in absentia in 2015 on war crimes charges for his part in fighting the revolution that toppled his father, Muammar Gaddafi.
translation.medium: 赛乌夫·卡扎菲在2015年因参与推翻其父亲穆阿迈尔·卡扎菲的革命而被宣判战争罪。
translation.reference: 赛义夫·卡扎菲于 2015 年在未出庭的情况下被判战争罪，罪名是参与推翻他父亲穆阿迈尔·卡扎菲的革命。

translation.en: He denies wrongdoing.
translation.zh: 他否认了这项指控。
translation.source: He denies wrongdoing.
translation.medium: 他否认有任何不当行为。
translation.reference: 他否认了这项指控。

translation.en: The presence of tens of thousands of foreign fighters, mercenaries and indigenous militia make the country a tinderbox, and there are fears an election conducted with disputed candidates would only lead to a result that was not recognized.
translation.zh: 数以万计的外国武装分子、雇佣军和当地民兵的存在使这个国家成为一个火药桶，人们担心由有争议的候选人参与选举只会导致选举结果不被承认。
translation.source: The presence of tens of thousands of foreign fighters, mercenaries and indigenous militia make the country a tinderbox, and there are fears an election conducted with disputed candidates would only lead to a result that was not recognized.
translation.medium: 数以万计的外国战斗人员、雇佣兵和本土民兵的存在使这个国家成为一个易燃的火药桶，人们担心，用有争议的候选人进行的选举只会导致一个不被认可的结果。
translation.reference: 数以万计的外国武装分子、雇佣军和当地民兵的存在使这个国家成为一个火药桶，人们担心由有争议的候选人参与选举只会导致选举结果不被承认。

translation.en: In a sign of the tensions over foreign forces, France is pressing the EU to agree on Monday to impose sanctions on the Russian private military contractor Wagner Group, which it says operates in Libya and the Sahel.
translation.zh: 法国正在向欧盟施压，要求欧盟周一同意对俄罗斯私人军事承包商瓦格纳集团 (Wagner Group) 实施制裁，法国表示，该集团在利比亚和萨赫勒地区开展业务。
translation.source: In a sign of the tensions over foreign forces, France is pressing the EU to agree on Monday to impose sanctions on the Russian private military contractor Wagner Group, which it says operates in Libya and the Sahel.
translation.medium: 法国正在敦促欧盟在周一同意对俄罗斯私营军事承包商瓦格纳集团实施制裁，以此表明外国势力之间的紧张关系，瓦格纳集团据称在利比亚和撒哈拉地区活动。
translation.reference: 法国正在向欧盟施压，要求欧盟周一同意对俄罗斯私人军事承包商瓦格纳集团 (Wagner Group) 实施制裁，法国表示，该集团在利比亚和萨赫勒地区开展业务。

translation.en: Moscow denies Wagner is linked to the Russian state and has said it would retaliate against EU sanctions placed on its citizens.
translation.zh: 莫斯科否认瓦格纳与俄罗斯政府有联系，并表示将对欧盟对其公民实施的制裁进行报复。
translation.source: Moscow denies Wagner is linked to the Russian state and has said it would retaliate against EU sanctions placed on its citizens.
translation.medium: 莫斯科否认瓦格纳与俄罗斯国家有关联，并表示将对欧盟对其公民实施的制裁进行报复。
translation.reference: 莫斯科否认瓦格纳与俄罗斯政府有联系，并表示将对欧盟对其公民实施的制裁进行报复。

translation.en: The international community's ability to demand the Libyan political class stick to the 24 December election date, which was first agreed in February, has been hampered by the appointment of a UN special envoy, Ján Kubiš, who resigned three weeks before the elections after less than a year in the post.
translation.zh: 国际社会要求利比亚政治阶层按照 2 月达成的一致意见仍于 12 月 24 日进行选举的能力受到了联合国任命的特使 Ján Kubiš 的阻碍，这位联合国特使在利比亚选举前三周辞职，此前他在该职位任职不到一年。
translation.source: The international community's ability to demand the Libyan political class stick to the 24 December election date, which was first agreed in February, has been hampered by the appointment of a UN special envoy, Ján Kubiš, who resigned three weeks before the elections after less than a year in the post.
translation.medium: 国际社会要求利比亚政界遵守2月首次达成的12月24日选举日期的能力受到了联合国特使Ján Kubiš辞职的阻碍，他在任职不到一年的时间里就在选举前三周辞职了。
translation.reference: 国际社会要求利比亚政治阶层按照 2 月达成的一致意见仍于 12 月 24 日进行选举的能力受到了联合国任命的特使 Ján Kubiš 的阻碍，这位联合国特使在利比亚选举前三周辞职，此前他在该职位任职不到一年。

translation.en: The UN secretary general, António Guterres, has since appointed Stephanie Williams, a forceful former UN deputy special envoy, to act as his special adviser.
translation.zh: 联合国秘书长 António Guterres 此前已经任命精明强干的前联合国副特使 Stephanie Williams 出任他的特别顾问。
translation.source: The UN secretary general, António Guterres, has since appointed Stephanie Williams, a forceful former UN deputy special envoy, to act as his special adviser.
translation.medium: 联合国秘书长安东尼奥·古特雷斯（António Guterres）已任命前联合国副特使史蒂芬妮·威廉斯（Stephanie Williams）担任他的特别顾问。
translation.reference: 联合国秘书长 António Guterres 此前已经任命精明强干的前联合国副特使 Stephanie Williams 出任他的特别顾问。

translation.en: Russia vetoed her appointment as a full envoy, but she has deep knowledge of Libya and last year displayed a willingness to confront those in the political class opposed to elections.
translation.zh: 但是俄罗斯否决了对她的正式特使任命，她对利比亚了解颇深，去年还表现出了对抗反对选举的政治阶层的意愿。
translation.source: Russia vetoed her appointment as a full envoy, but she has deep knowledge of Libya and last year displayed a willingness to confront those in the political class opposed to elections.
translation.medium: 俄罗斯否决了她作为全权特使的任命，但她对利比亚有深入的了解，去年表现出了面对政治阶层反对选举的意愿。
translation.reference: 但是俄罗斯否决了对她的正式特使任命，她对利比亚了解颇深，去年还表现出了对抗反对选举的政治阶层的意愿。

translation.en: The UN mission issued a statement urging all sides not to reverse the gains made, pointing to the registration of nearly 3 million voters, the successful distribution of voter cards and the applications of large numbers of candidates for the presidency and parliament as signs of deep popular support for elections.
translation.zh: 联合国代表团发表声明，敦促各方不要扭转所取得的成果，指出登记了近 300 万的选民，成功分发了选民卡和许多人申请成为总统和议员候选人，这些都是受到民众支持的迹象。
translation.source: The UN mission issued a statement urging all sides not to reverse the gains made, pointing to the registration of nearly 3 million voters, the successful distribution of voter cards and the applications of large numbers of candidates for the presidency and parliament as signs of deep popular support for elections.
translation.medium: 联合国使团发表声明，敦促各方不要抹杀取得的进展，指出近300万选民已经登记，选民卡也已成功发放，大量候选人也已申请参加总统和议会选举，这些都表明民众深深支持选举。
translation.reference: 联合国代表团发表声明，敦促各方不要扭转所取得的成果，指出登记了近 300 万的选民，成功分发了选民卡和许多人申请成为总统和议员候选人，这些都是受到民众支持的迹象。

translation.en: The US ambassador to Libya, Richard Norland, said "refusing to go to the elections and mobilizing to obstruct will only place the fate and future of the country at the mercy of those inside Libya and their external backers who prefer bullet power over ballot power."
translation.zh: 美国驻利比亚大使理查德·诺兰德 (Richard Norland) 说:“拒绝参加选举，动员民众进行阻挠，只会把国家的命运和未来置于利比亚内部和他们的外部支持者的摆布之下，这些人更喜欢子弹的力量，而不是投票权。”
translation.source: The US ambassador to Libya, Richard Norland, said "refusing to go to the elections and mobilizing to obstruct will only place the fate and future of the country at the mercy of those inside Libya and their external backers who prefer bullet power over ballot power."
translation.medium: 美国驻利比亚大使理查德·诺兰德表示：“拒绝参加选举并组织阻碍活动只会使该国的命运和未来掌握在利比亚境内及其外部支持者手中，他们更偏爱用子弹而不是选票来掌权。”
translation.reference: 美国驻利比亚大使理查德·诺兰德 (Richard Norland) 说:“拒绝参加选举，动员民众进行阻挠，只会把国家的命运和未来置于利比亚内部和他们的外部支持者的摆布之下，这些人更喜欢子弹的力量，而不是投票权。”

translation.en: Android hardware Cleaning tip
translation.zh: Android 硬件清洁窍门
translation.source: Android hardware Cleaning tip
translation.medium: 中文：安卓硬件清洁小贴士
translation.reference: Android 硬件清洁窍门

translation.en: Thin (0.3mm - 0.5mm) DRY interdental brushes are ideal for clearing those tiny port holes which house your smart device microphones and speakers.
translation.zh: 细细的（0.3 毫米- 0.5 毫米）DRY 牙间刷是清洁智能设备麦克风和扬声器所在的微小端口孔的理想选择。
translation.source: Thin (0.3mm - 0.5mm) DRY interdental brushes are ideal for clearing those tiny port holes which house your smart device microphones and speakers.
translation.medium: 薄（0.3毫米-0.5毫米）干式牙间刷非常适合清理那些容纳智能设备麦克风和扬声器的小孔。
translation.reference: 细细的（0.3 毫米- 0.5 毫米）DRY 牙间刷是清洁智能设备麦克风和扬声器所在的微小端口孔的理想选择。

translation.en: They are a cheap product and safer than many other methods, such as rubbing alcohols, tooth picks, pins, and needles.
translation.zh: 牙间刷很便宜，而且比酒精、牙签、大头针和缝衣针等这些方法都更安全。
translation.source: They are a cheap product and safer than many other methods, such as rubbing alcohols, tooth picks, pins, and needles.
translation.medium: 他們是一種廉價的產品，比起擦酒精、牙籤、針和針筒等其他方法更安全。
translation.reference: 牙间刷很便宜，而且比酒精、牙签、大头针和缝衣针等这些方法都更安全。

translation.en: I just used this method to clear the microphone port on my Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 Classic as it was not registering my voice when using speech to text functions.
translation.zh: 我刚刚用这个方法清理了我的三星 Galaxy Watch 4 Classic 的麦克风端口，因为我在使用语音转文本功能时，手机没有录制我的声音。
translation.source: I just used this method to clear the microphone port on my Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 Classic as it was not registering my voice when using speech to text functions.
translation.medium: 我剛剛用這種方法清理了我的三星Galaxy Watch 4 Classic的麥克風端口，因為使用語音轉文字功能時它沒有註冊我的聲音。
translation.reference: 我刚刚用这个方法清理了我的三星 Galaxy Watch 4 Classic 的麦克风端口，因为我在使用语音转文本功能时，手机没有录制我的声音。

translation.en: After months of thinking, I would need to arrange a warranty replacement or need to book a repair.
translation.zh: 在经过几个月反复思考是否需要安排保修更换或预约维修之后。
translation.source: After months of thinking, I would need to arrange a warranty replacement or need to book a repair.
translation.medium: 经过几个月的思考，我需要安排一次保修更换或需要预约维修。
translation.reference: 在经过几个月反复思考是否需要安排保修更换或预约维修之后。

translation.en: After much frustration shouting at my watch during phone calls so I could be heard and/or understood.
translation.zh: 在为了让别人能听到和/或听懂我说的话而在打电话时对着手表大喊大叫之后。
translation.source: After much frustration shouting at my watch during phone calls so I could be heard and/or understood.
translation.medium: 在打电话时，我经历了许多挫折，不得不朝我的手表大喊，才能被听到或理解。
translation.reference: 在为了让别人能听到和/或听懂我说的话而在打电话时对着手表大喊大叫之后。

translation.en: After following manufacturer advice and using the water lock functions, resetting the device AND factory restoring my device.
translation.zh: 在按照制造商的建议并使用水锁功能复位设备并恢复设备出厂设置之后。
translation.source: After following manufacturer advice and using the water lock functions, resetting the device AND factory restoring my device.
translation.medium: 按照制造商的建议使用水锁功能，重置设备和恢复出厂设置后。
translation.reference: 在按照制造商的建议并使用水锁功能复位设备并恢复设备出厂设置之后。

translation.en: And after scouring the internet on multiple occasions.
translation.zh: 在网上搜索好几遍之后。
translation.source: And after scouring the internet on multiple occasions.
translation.medium: 经过多次在网上搜索之后。
translation.reference: 在网上搜索好几遍之后。

translation.en: There seemed to be no guaranteed satisfaction.
translation.zh: 没有什么办法能让我满意。
translation.source: There seemed to be no guaranteed satisfaction.
translation.medium: 似乎没有任何保证的满意。
translation.reference: 没有什么办法能让我满意。

translation.en: Then I had a revelation and I tried interdental brushes, and they work...
translation.zh: 然后我灵机一动，试了试牙间刷，它们很管用……
translation.source: Then I had a revelation and I tried interdental brushes, and they work...
translation.medium: 然后我有了一个启示，我尝试了牙间刷，它们确实有用...
translation.reference: 然后我灵机一动，试了试牙间刷，它们很管用……

translation.en: They work very VERY well!
translation.zh: 非常非常管用！
translation.source: They work very VERY well!
translation.medium: 他們工作得非常好！
translation.reference: 非常非常管用！

translation.en: After a few pokes and twizzles with the thin but firm bristled rod, your device should work just as it did when it was brand new.
translation.zh: 用这根细而结实的鬃毛棒拨弄几下之后，您的设备就能像全新的时候一样工作了。
translation.source: After a few pokes and twizzles with the thin but firm bristled rod, your device should work just as it did when it was brand new.
translation.medium: 用细而硬的毛刷来捅捅和拧拧几下，你的设备应该就像新的一样正常工作了。
translation.reference: 用这根细而结实的鬃毛棒拨弄几下之后，您的设备就能像全新的时候一样工作了。

translation.en: *I advise this be done with a dry brush, and will not accept any repercussion if you decide to use it with any combination of any cleaning product.
translation.zh: *我建议使用干毛刷，如果您要配合其他清洁产品使用，后果自负。
translation.source: *I advise this be done with a dry brush, and will not accept any repercussion if you decide to use it with any combination of any cleaning product.
translation.medium: 我建議用乾刷來做這件事，如果你決定用任何清潔產品的任何組合，我不會接受任何後果。
translation.reference: *我建议使用干毛刷，如果您要配合其他清洁产品使用，后果自负。

translation.en: South Africa Pays Tribute to Last Apartheid Leader De Klerk
translation.zh: 南非向最后一位实施种族隔离制度的领袖德克勒克致敬
translation.source: South Africa Pays Tribute to Last Apartheid Leader De Klerk
translation.medium: 南非向最后一位种族隔离制度领导人德克勒克致敬
translation.reference: 南非向最后一位实施种族隔离制度的领袖德克勒克致敬

translation.en: South Africa on Sunday paid an official tribute to FW de Klerk, the final president of white rule, who freed Nelson Mandela from prison and steered the country from apartheid to democracy.
translation.zh: 南非周日正式向白人统治下的最后一任总统德克勒克 (FW de Klerk) 致敬，德克勒克将纳尔逊·曼德拉 (Nelson Mandela) 从监狱中释放出来，带领南非从种族隔离制度走向民主。
translation.source: South Africa on Sunday paid an official tribute to FW de Klerk, the final president of white rule, who freed Nelson Mandela from prison and steered the country from apartheid to democracy.
translation.medium: 周日，南非向白人统治的最后一位总统FW de Klerk表达了官方敬意，他释放了纳尔逊·曼德拉，并将该国从种族隔离制度推向民主。
translation.reference: 南非周日正式向白人统治下的最后一任总统德克勒克 (FW de Klerk) 致敬，德克勒克将纳尔逊·曼德拉 (Nelson Mandela) 从监狱中释放出来，带领南非从种族隔离制度走向民主。

translation.en: De Klerk died on November 11 aged 85 following a battle with cancer.
translation.zh: 11 月 11 日，德克勒克在与癌症抗争后去世，享年 85 岁。
translation.source: De Klerk died on November 11 aged 85 following a battle with cancer.
translation.medium: 德克勒克于11月11日去世，享年85岁，此前他曾与癌症作斗争。
translation.reference: 11 月 11 日，德克勒克在与癌症抗争后去世，享年 85 岁。

translation.en: Four days of national mourning were declared in his honor.
translation.zh: 为纪念他，宣布全国哀悼四天。
translation.source: Four days of national mourning were declared in his honor.
translation.medium: 为纪念他，全国宣布举行四天的国葬。
translation.reference: 为纪念他，宣布全国哀悼四天。

translation.en: He served as president from 1989 to 1994 and is remembered most for leading South Africa's transition from white-minority rule to the first multi-racial elections in 1994.
translation.zh: 他于 1989 年至 1994 年担任南非总统，并因领导南非从少数白人统治过渡到 1994 年首次多种族选举而被人们铭记。
translation.source: He served as president from 1989 to 1994 and is remembered most for leading South Africa's transition from white-minority rule to the first multi-racial elections in 1994.
translation.medium: 他从1989年到1994年担任总统，最被人们铭记的是他领导南非从白人少数统治到1994年的第一次多种族选举。
translation.reference: 他于 1989 年至 1994 年担任南非总统，并因领导南非从少数白人统治过渡到 1994 年首次多种族选举而被人们铭记。

translation.en: De Klerk also shared the Nobel Peace Prize with Mandela in 1993 after freeing him from prison in 1990.
translation.zh: 德克勒克在 1990 年将曼德拉从监狱释放，并于 1993 年与他共同获得了诺贝尔和平奖。
translation.source: De Klerk also shared the Nobel Peace Prize with Mandela in 1993 after freeing him from prison in 1990.
translation.medium: 德克勒克在1990年释放曼德拉之后，于1993年与曼德拉一起获得了诺贝尔和平奖。
translation.reference: 德克勒克在 1990 年将曼德拉从监狱释放，并于 1993 年与他共同获得了诺贝尔和平奖。

translation.en: Mandela then became South Africa's first black president after his African National Congress party won the 1994 election.
translation.zh: 1994 年，曼德拉领导的非洲人国民大会党 (African National Congress party) 赢得大选，成为南非首位黑人总统。
translation.source: Mandela then became South Africa's first black president after his African National Congress party won the 1994 election.
translation.medium: 那之后，曼德拉成为南非第一位黑人总统，因为他的非洲国民大会党在1994年的选举中获胜。
translation.reference: 1994 年，曼德拉领导的非洲人国民大会党 (African National Congress party) 赢得大选，成为南非首位黑人总统。

translation.en: President Cyril Ramaphosa attended Cape Town's Protestant Groote Kerk - one of South Africa's oldest churches - on Sunday morning to deliver a eulogy in De Klerk's honor.
translation.zh: 南非总统西里尔·拉马福萨 (Cyril Ramaphosa) 周日上午现身于开普敦的新教格鲁特教堂（南非最古老的教堂之一），为德克勒克致悼词。
translation.source: President Cyril Ramaphosa attended Cape Town's Protestant Groote Kerk - one of South Africa's oldest churches - on Sunday morning to deliver a eulogy in De Klerk's honor.
translation.medium: 周日早上，总统塞里尔·拉马福萨出席了南非最古老的教堂之一开普敦新教Groote Kerk，为德克勒克致敬演讲。
translation.reference: 南非总统西里尔·拉马福萨 (Cyril Ramaphosa) 周日上午现身于开普敦的新教格鲁特教堂（南非最古老的教堂之一），为德克勒克致悼词。

translation.en: "He was often misunderstood due to his over-correctness," De Klerk's widow Elita Georgiadis told around 200 attendees.
translation.zh: “由于他矫枉过正，他经常被误解，”德克勒克的遗孀 Elita Georgiadis 向约 200 名与会者诉说。
translation.source: "He was often misunderstood due to his over-correctness," De Klerk's widow Elita Georgiadis told around 200 attendees.
translation.medium: 他的遗孀埃丽塔·乔治亚迪斯对200余名出席者说，由于他过于正确，他经常被误解。
translation.reference: “由于他矫枉过正，他经常被误解，”德克勒克的遗孀 Elita Georgiadis 向约 200 名与会者诉说。

translation.en: I shall never forget this man who mesmerized me, who made me want to help him achieve this huge task ahead of him.
translation.zh: 我永远不会忘记他，他让我着迷，他让我想要帮助他完成摆在他面前的艰巨任务。
translation.source: I shall never forget this man who mesmerized me, who made me want to help him achieve this huge task ahead of him.
translation.medium: 我永遠不會忘記這個讓我着迷的人，他讓我想要幫助他完成他面前的巨大任務。
translation.reference: 我永远不会忘记他，他让我着迷，他让我想要帮助他完成摆在他面前的艰巨任务。

translation.en: A private mass and the national anthem preceded the ceremony, which featured a portrait of De Klerk between two candles and a choir decorated with white flowers.
translation.zh: 仪式前举行了私人弥撒，并奏起了国歌，两根蜡烛中间放着德克勒克的肖像，还有一个戴着白花的唱诗班。
translation.source: A private mass and the national anthem preceded the ceremony, which featured a portrait of De Klerk between two candles and a choir decorated with white flowers.
translation.medium: 私人弥撒和国歌在仪式之前演唱，仪式上放置了一幅德克勒克的肖像，两边放着蜡烛，还有一个用白色鲜花装饰的合唱团。
translation.reference: 仪式前举行了私人弥撒，并奏起了国歌，两根蜡烛中间放着德克勒克的肖像，还有一个戴着白花的唱诗班。

translation.en: Despite a positive reputation abroad, De Klerk divided opinion in South Africa and his death prompted mixed reactions.
translation.zh: 尽管德克勒克在国外享有良好声誉，但南非国内对他的看法却存在分歧，他的去世引发了不同的反应。
translation.source: Despite a positive reputation abroad, De Klerk divided opinion in South Africa and his death prompted mixed reactions.
translation.medium: 尽管在国外享有良好声誉，德克勒克在南非引起了不同意见，他的去世也引发了不同的反应。
translation.reference: 尽管德克勒克在国外享有良好声誉，但南非国内对他的看法却存在分歧，他的去世引发了不同的反应。

translation.en: Critics say he remains inseparable from apartheid-era crimes and could have been held accountable for them had he lived longer.
translation.zh: 批评人士说，他仍然与种族隔离时期的罪行密不可分，如果他活得久一点，可能会被追究责任。
translation.source: Critics say he remains inseparable from apartheid-era crimes and could have been held accountable for them had he lived longer.
translation.medium: 批評家說，他仍與種族隔離時代的罪行密不可分，如果他活得更久，可能會對此負責。
translation.reference: 批评人士说，他仍然与种族隔离时期的罪行密不可分，如果他活得久一点，可能会被追究责任。

translation.en: De Klerk represented the National Party, which in 1948 formally established apartheid's racial segregation and disenfranchisement of South Africa's non-white majority.
translation.zh: 德克勒克代表国民党，该党在 1948 年正式确立了种族隔离制度，剥夺了南非占多数的非白人的选举权。
translation.source: De Klerk represented the National Party, which in 1948 formally established apartheid's racial segregation and disenfranchisement of South Africa's non-white majority.
translation.medium: 德克勒克代表的是国民党，1948年该党正式建立了南非种族隔离和剥夺非白人多数派的公民权利的种族隔离制度。
translation.reference: 德克勒克代表国民党，该党在 1948 年正式确立了种族隔离制度，剥夺了南非占多数的非白人的选举权。

translation.en: Outside the church, a small group of protesters held signs saying, "Justice denied" and "Justice for apartheid victims" and were swiftly led away by police.
translation.zh: 在教堂外，一小群抗议者举着标语，上面写着“拒绝正义”和“为种族隔离受害者伸张正义”，他们很快被警察带走。
translation.source: Outside the church, a small group of protesters held signs saying, "Justice denied" and "Justice for apartheid victims" and were swiftly led away by police.
translation.medium: 在教堂外面，一小群抗议者举着标语牌说“正义被剥夺”和“为种族隔离受害者讨回公道”，然后被警察迅速带走。
translation.reference: 在教堂外，一小群抗议者举着标语，上面写着“拒绝正义”和“为种族隔离受害者伸张正义”，他们很快被警察带走。

translation.en: The surrounding area was closed to traffic and placed under high security.
translation.zh: 周边地区已封锁交通，并处于高度戒备状态。
translation.source: The surrounding area was closed to traffic and placed under high security.
translation.medium: 周围地区被封锁，并加强了安全措施。
translation.reference: 周边地区已封锁交通，并处于高度戒备状态。

translation.en: Comments in his final years also tarnished De Klerk's image amid criticism for his failure to apologize officially for the crimes of apartheid.
translation.zh: 德克勒克最后几年的言论也损害了他的形象，因为他没有就种族隔离的罪行正式道歉。
translation.source: Comments in his final years also tarnished De Klerk's image amid criticism for his failure to apologize officially for the crimes of apartheid.
translation.medium: 在他最后几年的评论也玷污了德克勒克的形象，因为他未能正式为种族隔离罪行道歉而受到批评。
translation.reference: 德克勒克最后几年的言论也损害了他的形象，因为他没有就种族隔离的罪行正式道歉。

translation.en: In 2020, he denied apartheid was a crime against humanity before retracting the statement and apologizing.
translation.zh: 2020 年，他否认种族隔离是反人类罪，然后收回声明并道歉。
translation.source: In 2020, he denied apartheid was a crime against humanity before retracting the statement and apologizing.
translation.medium: 在2020年，他否认种族隔离是对人类的罪行，但随后收回了这一声明并道歉了。
translation.reference: 2020 年，他否认种族隔离是反人类罪，然后收回声明并道歉。

translation.en: De Klerk's foundation issued a posthumous video apologizing "for the pain, hurt, indignity and damage that apartheid has done" to South Africa's non-white populations.
translation.zh: 德克勒克的基金会在他死后发布了一段视频，为种族隔离制度对南非非白人人口“造成的痛苦、伤害、侮辱和损害”道歉。
translation.source: De Klerk's foundation issued a posthumous video apologizing "for the pain, hurt, indignity and damage that apartheid has done" to South Africa's non-white populations.
translation.medium: 德克勒克基金会发布了一段视频，为种族隔离给南非非白人种族带来的痛苦、伤害、侮辱和损害表示歉意。
translation.reference: 德克勒克的基金会在他死后发布了一段视频，为种族隔离制度对南非非白人人口“造成的痛苦、伤害、侮辱和损害”道歉。

translation.en: I'm unable to make any changes once the order has been placed however, when the rider leaves the restaurant you will be able to contact them through the app.
translation.zh: 下单后，我就无法更改订单，但是在骑手离开餐厅后，您可以通过 App 与他联系。
translation.source: I'm unable to make any changes once the order has been placed however, when the rider leaves the restaurant you will be able to contact them through the app.
translation.medium: 我无法在订单下达后做出任何更改，但是当骑手离开餐厅时，您可以通过应用程序与他们联系。
translation.reference: 下单后，我就无法更改订单，但是在骑手离开餐厅后，您可以通过 App 与他联系。

translation.en: You can also track your rider through the app and phone them once they’re nearby.
translation.zh: 您还可以通过 App 跟踪骑手，等他到了附近给他打电话。
translation.source: You can also track your rider through the app and phone them once they’re nearby.
translation.medium: 你也可以通过应用程序跟踪你的骑手，一旦他们靠近，就可以给他们打电话。
translation.reference: 您还可以通过 App 跟踪骑手，等他到了附近给他打电话。

translation.en: For future orders, you can add instructions for your rider by editing your saved addresses in the app.
translation.zh: 对于未来的订单，您可以在 App 中编辑您保存的地址，为骑手添加说明。
translation.source: For future orders, you can add instructions for your rider by editing your saved addresses in the app.
translation.medium: 对于未来的订单，您可以通过在应用程序中编辑您保存的地址来为骑手添加指令。
translation.reference: 对于未来的订单，您可以在 App 中编辑您保存的地址，为骑手添加说明。

translation.en: Avalanche at Washington state ski resort kills 1, traps 5
translation.zh: 华盛顿州滑雪胜地发生雪崩，造成 1 人死亡，5 人被困
translation.source: Avalanche at Washington state ski resort kills 1, traps 5
translation.medium: 华盛顿州滑雪度假胜地发生雪崩，造成1人死亡，5人被困。
translation.reference: 华盛顿州滑雪胜地发生雪崩，造成 1 人死亡，5 人被困

translation.en: An avalanche swept through part of a Washington state ski resort used to access backcountry skiing on Saturday, killing a 60-year-old man and temporarily trapping five others.
translation.zh: 周六，华盛顿州一处滑雪胜地发生雪崩，造成一名 60 岁男子死亡，另有 5 人暂时被困。
translation.source: An avalanche swept through part of a Washington state ski resort used to access backcountry skiing on Saturday, killing a 60-year-old man and temporarily trapping five others.
translation.medium: 周六，华盛顿州一个滑雪度假村的部分地区发生了雪崩，一名60岁男子死亡，另外五人暂时被困。
translation.reference: 周六，华盛顿州一处滑雪胜地发生雪崩，造成一名 60 岁男子死亡，另有 5 人暂时被困。

translation.en: The avalanche was reported about 10:50 a.m. in the Silver Basin area of Crystal Mountain, which is located about 85 miles (137 kilometers) southeast of Seattle, said Pierce County Sheriff's Department Sgt. Darren Moss.
translation.zh: 皮尔斯县警长达伦·莫斯 (Darren Moss) 说，雪崩发生在上午 10 点 50 分左右，地点在西雅图东南约 85 英里（137 公里）的水晶山银盆地区。
translation.source: The avalanche was reported about 10:50 a.m. in the Silver Basin area of Crystal Mountain, which is located about 85 miles (137 kilometers) southeast of Seattle, said Pierce County Sheriff's Department Sgt. Darren Moss.
translation.medium: 据皮尔斯县警察局的达伦·莫斯警官报告，大约上午10点50分，在距西雅图东南方85英里（137公里）的水晶山的银盆地区发生了雪崩。
translation.reference: 皮尔斯县警长达伦·莫斯 (Darren Moss) 说，雪崩发生在上午 10 点 50 分左右，地点在西雅图东南约 85 英里（137 公里）的水晶山银盆地区。

translation.en: The identity of the man who died hasn't been released, but authorities say he wasn't breathing after being pulled out of the snow and didn't survive despite CPR efforts by another skier.
translation.zh: 死亡男子的身份尚未公布，但当局表示，他被从雪中拉出来后就没有了呼吸，有一名滑雪者对他进行了心肺复苏，但他还是没能活下来。
translation.source: The identity of the man who died hasn't been released, but authorities say he wasn't breathing after being pulled out of the snow and didn't survive despite CPR efforts by another skier.
translation.medium: 这名死者的身份尚未公布，但当局表示，他在被另一位滑雪者从雪地中拉出后已经停止呼吸，尽管经过另一位滑雪者的CPR（心肺复苏）努力，他仍未能存活。
translation.reference: 死亡男子的身份尚未公布，但当局表示，他被从雪中拉出来后就没有了呼吸，有一名滑雪者对他进行了心肺复苏，但他还是没能活下来。

translation.en: The other skiers in his group rescued themselves with the help of two witnesses who saw them get swept up by the snow.
translation.zh: 在两名目击者的帮助下，与该男子一起的其他滑雪者获救，这两名目击者看到他们被雪吞没。
translation.source: The other skiers in his group rescued themselves with the help of two witnesses who saw them get swept up by the snow.
translation.medium: 其他滑雪者在兩名目擊者的幫助下自救了出來，他們被雪崩卷走了。
translation.reference: 在两名目击者的帮助下，与该男子一起的其他滑雪者获救，这两名目击者看到他们被雪吞没。

translation.en: All were wearing avalanche beacons.
translation.zh: 所有人都带着雪崩信标。
translation.source: All were wearing avalanche beacons.
translation.medium: 他们都戴着雪崩信标。
translation.reference: 所有人都带着雪崩信标。

translation.en: While all of those caught in the avalanche were experienced backcountry skiers, a warning had been issued against skiing in the area, which was just inside the boundaries of Crystal Mountain Resort.
translation.zh: 被雪崩困住的都是经验丰富的野外滑雪者，但其实水晶山度假村边界以内的地区已经发布了禁止滑雪的警告。
translation.source: While all of those caught in the avalanche were experienced backcountry skiers, a warning had been issued against skiing in the area, which was just inside the boundaries of Crystal Mountain Resort.
translation.medium: 虽然所有被困在雪崩中的人都是经验丰富的山地滑雪者，但是已经发出警告，不要在这个区域滑雪，这个区域正好在水晶山度假村的边界内。
translation.reference: 被雪崩困住的都是经验丰富的野外滑雪者，但其实水晶山度假村边界以内的地区已经发布了禁止滑雪的警告。

translation.en: The private ski resort determines the conditions but there is nothing that stops skiers from going there because the property abuts public lands in the Mount Baker-Snoqualmie National Forest.
translation.zh: 虽然该私人滑雪度假村了解相关情况，但没有障碍物阻止滑雪者前往那里，因为它与贝克-斯诺夸尔米山国家森林的公共土地相毗邻。
translation.source: The private ski resort determines the conditions but there is nothing that stops skiers from going there because the property abuts public lands in the Mount Baker-Snoqualmie National Forest.
translation.medium: 私人滑雪度假村决定了条件，但没有什么阻止滑雪者去那里，因为贝克山-斯诺夸尔米国家森林的公共土地毗邻该地产。
translation.reference: 虽然该私人滑雪度假村了解相关情况，但没有障碍物阻止滑雪者前往那里，因为它与贝克-斯诺夸尔米山国家森林的公共土地相毗邻。

translation.en: Frank DeBerry, the resort's president and CEO, said all six men held the ski resort's uphill travel passes, which means they were registered with ski patrol, participated in an orientation on how and where to access backcountry skiing through the resort's property and were required to check snow conditions prior to their excursion.
translation.zh: 该度假村的总裁兼首席执行官弗兰克·德贝里 (Frank DeBerry) 说，这六个人都有度假村的上山通行证，也就是说他们在滑雪巡逻队登记过，并且了解过如何以及通过度假村的哪个位置进入野外滑雪，他们应该被要求在远足之前检查过雪的条件。
translation.source: Frank DeBerry, the resort's president and CEO, said all six men held the ski resort's uphill travel passes, which means they were registered with ski patrol, participated in an orientation on how and where to access backcountry skiing through the resort's property and were required to check snow conditions prior to their excursion.
translation.medium: 法兰克·德贝里（Frank DeBerry），该度假村的总裁兼首席执行官，表示，所有六名男子都持有该滑雪度假村的上山旅行通行证，这意味着他们已经向滑雪巡护队登记，参加了一个关于如何通过该度假村的财产访问后山滑雪的定位以及在出行前必须检查雪况的培训。
translation.reference: 该度假村的总裁兼首席执行官弗兰克·德贝里 (Frank DeBerry) 说，这六个人都有度假村的上山通行证，也就是说他们在滑雪巡逻队登记过，并且了解过如何以及通过度假村的哪个位置进入野外滑雪，他们应该被要求在远足之前检查过雪的条件。

translation.en: "Skiers can travel at will wherever they want in the national forest.
translation.zh: “滑雪者有权到国家森林里旅行。
translation.source: "Skiers can travel at will wherever they want in the national forest.
translation.medium: 滑雪者可以随意在国家森林中去任何他们想去的地方。
translation.reference: “滑雪者有权到国家森林里旅行。

translation.en: They had gone out into the forest but ended up back in bounds (of the resort) where this slide occurred," DeBerry said
translation.zh: 他们已经跑到森林里去了，但最后又回到了发生雪崩的地方，”德贝里表示。
translation.source: They had gone out into the forest but ended up back in bounds (of the resort) where this slide occurred," DeBerry said
translation.medium: 他們已經出去到森林，但最終又回到了度假村的界限，就是這個滑梯發生的地方，” DeBerry 說。
translation.reference: 他们已经跑到森林里去了，但最后又回到了发生雪崩的地方，”德贝里表示。

translation.en: In addition to shutting the area where the slide occurred, the resort earlier in the day closed the Mt. Rainier Gondola because of winds reaching 100 miles per hour (161 kilometers per hour).
translation.zh: 除了关闭发生滑坡的区域外，该度假村当天早些时候还关闭了进山道路。雷尼尔贡多拉的风速达到每小时 100 英里（每小时 161 公里）。
translation.source: In addition to shutting the area where the slide occurred, the resort earlier in the day closed the Mt. Rainier Gondola because of winds reaching 100 miles per hour (161 kilometers per hour).
translation.medium: 除了关闭发生滑梯事件的区域外，该度假村当天早些时候还因风速达到100英里/小时（161公里/小时）而关闭了雷尼尔山缆车。
translation.reference: 除了关闭发生滑坡的区域外，该度假村当天早些时候还关闭了进山道路。雷尼尔贡多拉的风速达到每小时 100 英里（每小时 161 公里）。

translation.en: The avalanche came amid the season's first major snowfall.
translation.zh: 雪崩发生时正值这个季节的第一场大雪。
translation.source: The avalanche came amid the season's first major snowfall.
translation.medium: 雪崩是在本季度第一次大雪来临时发生的。
translation.reference: 雪崩发生时正值这个季节的第一场大雪。

translation.en: The area is under a winter storm warning until Sunday morning, with the National Weather Service saying 12 to 15 inches (38 centimeters) of snow is possible for areas above 2,000 feet (610 meters).
translation.zh: 该地区的冬季风暴预警将持续到周日上午，美国国家气象局表示，在 2000 英尺（610 米）以上的地区可能会 有12 至 15 英寸（38 厘米）的降雪。
translation.source: The area is under a winter storm warning until Sunday morning, with the National Weather Service saying 12 to 15 inches (38 centimeters) of snow is possible for areas above 2,000 feet (610 meters).
translation.medium: 根據國家氣象局的說法，海拔2000英尺（610米）以上的地區可能會有12至15英寸（38厘米）的降雪，因此該地區直到星期日早上仍處於冬季暴雪警報之下。
translation.reference: 该地区的冬季风暴预警将持续到周日上午，美国国家气象局表示，在 2000 英尺（610 米）以上的地区可能会 有12 至 15 英寸（38 厘米）的降雪。

translation.en: "We've had a late start to the season and now we've gone from virtually no snow to a giant snow storm.
