translation.medium: 当你退回物品时，你必须附上一张说明你的eBay ID和你需要的尺寸的便条。
translation.reference: 退货时，必须在纸条上写明您的 eBay ID 和要换的尺码。

translation.en: If you placed an international order, half of the shipping original charged would be applied again.
translation.zh: 如果是国际订单，将再次收取原运费的一半。
translation.source: If you placed an international order, half of the shipping original charged would be applied again.
translation.medium: 如果您下了一个国际订单，原来收取的运费的一半将再次被收取。
translation.reference: 如果是国际订单，将再次收取原运费的一半。

translation.en: 2) Use the eBay option to return an item.
translation.zh: 2) 使用 eBay 选项退货。
translation.source: 2) Use the eBay option to return an item.
translation.medium: 使用eBay选项退回一件商品。
translation.reference: 2) 使用 eBay 选项退货。

translation.en: This option is also suitable if you would like a refund, as once we have received the item back we will refund you; if you need an exchange, please purchase the correct item either before or after the refund as required.
translation.zh: 如果您要退款，也可以使用这个选项，我们收到退回的商品后即会为您退款；如果您要换货，请根据需要在退款前或退款后购买正确的商品。
translation.source: This option is also suitable if you would like a refund, as once we have received the item back we will refund you; if you need an exchange, please purchase the correct item either before or after the refund as required.
translation.medium: 如果您想要退款，这个选项也是合适的，因为一旦我们收到物品，我们将退还您的款项；如果您需要更换，请在退款前或退款后根据需要购买正确的物品。
translation.reference: 如果您要退款，也可以使用这个选项，我们收到退回的商品后即会为您退款；如果您要换货，请根据需要在退款前或退款后购买正确的商品。

translation.en: Please use the “add to basket” function so that you order stays together.
translation.zh: 请使用“加入购物篮”功能组合订单。
translation.source: Please use the “add to basket” function so that you order stays together.
translation.medium: 请使用“添加到购物篮”功能，以便您的订单保持在一起。
translation.reference: 请使用“加入购物篮”功能组合订单。

translation.en: If items are ordered individually, we cannot guarantee that they will be shipped together.
translation.zh: 如果单独下单，我们不能保证各个订单会一起发货。
translation.source: If items are ordered individually, we cannot guarantee that they will be shipped together.
translation.medium: 如果單獨訂購，我們無法保證它們會一起發貨。
translation.reference: 如果单独下单，我们不能保证各个订单会一起发货。

translation.en: Once all items are in your shopping basket, please checkout and pay as normal and we will refund the excess shipping.
translation.zh: 在将所有商品加入购物篮后，正常结帐并付款，我们将退还多余的运费。
translation.source: Once all items are in your shopping basket, please checkout and pay as normal and we will refund the excess shipping.
translation.medium: 一旦所有物品都在您的购物篮中，请按照正常程序结账并支付，我们将退还多余的运费。
translation.reference: 在将所有商品加入购物篮后，正常结帐并付款，我们将退还多余的运费。

translation.en: If you haven’t received your refund after we have marked an item as dispatched, please send us a message so that we can have the refund processed.
translation.zh: 如果您尚未收到退款，订购的商品即标记为已发货，请发消息提醒我们退款。
translation.source: If you haven’t received your refund after we have marked an item as dispatched, please send us a message so that we can have the refund processed.
translation.medium: 如果您在我们标记物品已发出后仍未收到退款，请给我们发消息，以便我们处理退款。
translation.reference: 如果您尚未收到退款，订购的商品即标记为已发货，请发消息提醒我们退款。

translation.en: Q. Do you include a receipt?
translation.zh: Q.有收据吗？
translation.source: Q. Do you include a receipt?
translation.medium: 你包括收据吗？
translation.reference: Q.有收据吗？

translation.en: A. No, we do not include receipts in packages unless requested.
translation.zh: A.除非您有要求，否则我们不提供收据。
translation.source: A. No, we do not include receipts in packages unless requested.
translation.medium: 不，除非要求，我们不在包裹中包含收据。
translation.reference: A.除非您有要求，否则我们不提供收据。

translation.en: If you require a receipt, please send us a message and we can have one emailed over.
translation.zh: 如果您需要收据，请告诉我们，我们可以通过电子邮件发给您。
translation.source: If you require a receipt, please send us a message and we can have one emailed over.
translation.medium: 如果您需要收据，请给我们发消息，我们可以通过电子邮件发送一份。
translation.reference: 如果您需要收据，请告诉我们，我们可以通过电子邮件发给您。

translation.en: If you require a VAT receipt, please contact us and we can email one over.
translation.zh: 如果您需要增值税收据，请联系我们，我们可以发邮件给您。
translation.source: If you require a VAT receipt, please contact us and we can email one over.
translation.medium: 如果您需要增值税收据，请联系我们，我们可以通过电子邮件发送一份。
translation.reference: 如果您需要增值税收据，请联系我们，我们可以发邮件给您。

translation.en: Q. I have been waiting a while for my order and it hasn’t arrived.
translation.zh: Q.我的订单发货好久了，我都没收到。
translation.source: Q. I have been waiting a while for my order and it hasn’t arrived.
translation.medium: 我等了一段时间我的订单还没有到达。
translation.reference: Q.我的订单发货好久了，我都没收到。

translation.en: Is it possibly lost?
translation.zh: 不会是丢了吧？
translation.source: Is it possibly lost?
translation.medium: 它可能丢失了吗？
translation.reference: 不会是丢了吧？

translation.en: A. For orders going to the UK, please give your order 7 days to arrive, Europe 21 days and rest of world 30 days.
translation.zh: A.英国订单大约 7 天到达，欧洲 21 天，世界其他地区 30 天。
translation.source: A. For orders going to the UK, please give your order 7 days to arrive, Europe 21 days and rest of world 30 days.
translation.medium: 对于发往英国的订单，请给您的订单7天的到达时间，欧洲21天，其他地区30天。
translation.reference: A.英国订单大约 7 天到达，欧洲 21 天，世界其他地区 30 天。

translation.en: If you order still hasn’t arrived after these dates, please contact us so that we can investigate with the delivery agent.
translation.zh: 如果您的订单经过这些天数日期之后仍未送达，请与我们联系，我们将询问货运代理。
translation.source: If you order still hasn’t arrived after these dates, please contact us so that we can investigate with the delivery agent.
translation.medium: 如果您的订单在这些日期之后仍未到达，请联系我们，以便我们可以与快递代理商进行调查。
translation.reference: 如果您的订单经过这些天数日期之后仍未送达，请与我们联系，我们将询问货运代理。

translation.en: Please note this can take up to 2 weeks, but as soon as we have an update, we will let you know.
translation.zh: 请注意，我们最多 2 周才能知道结果，但是一有新消息，我们会立即通知您。
translation.source: Please note this can take up to 2 weeks, but as soon as we have an update, we will let you know.
translation.medium: 请注意，这可能需要长达两周的时间，但一旦我们有更新，我们会立即通知您。
translation.reference: 请注意，我们最多 2 周才能知道结果，但是一有新消息，我们会立即通知您。

translation.en: Q. I am outside of the EU.
translation.zh: Q.我不在欧盟国家。
translation.source: Q. I am outside of the EU.
translation.medium: 我不在欧盟境外。
translation.reference: Q.我不在欧盟国家。

translation.en: Do I have to pay any duties or customs?
translation.zh: 我需要支付关税吗？
translation.source: Do I have to pay any duties or customs?
translation.medium: 我需要缴纳任何关税或海关费吗？
translation.reference: 我需要支付关税吗？

translation.en: A. Please check this information with local authorities.
translation.zh: A.请向当地政府部门了解这一信息。
translation.source: A. Please check this information with local authorities.
translation.medium: 请与当地当局核实此信息。
translation.reference: A.请向当地政府部门了解这一信息。

translation.en: We do not accept any responsibility for customs or duty charges, nor will we pay any money towards them.
translation.zh: 我们不代收关税，也不向海关支付任何款项。
translation.source: We do not accept any responsibility for customs or duty charges, nor will we pay any money towards them.
translation.medium: 我们不承担任何海关或关税费用的责任，也不会支付任何费用。
translation.reference: 我们不代收关税，也不向海关支付任何款项。

translation.en: We do not alter information on customs declarations so please don’t ask.
translation.zh: 我们不能更改报关信息，因此无法回答这方面的问题。
translation.source: We do not alter information on customs declarations so please don’t ask.
translation.medium: 我们不会更改海关申报单上的信息，所以请不要询问。
translation.reference: 我们不能更改报关信息，因此无法回答这方面的问题。

translation.en: We thank you for your custom.
translation.zh: 感谢您的惠顾。
translation.source: We thank you for your custom.
translation.medium: 我们感谢您的惠顾。
translation.reference: 感谢您的惠顾。

translation.en: We are a small business based in the Isle of Man, and if you have any enquires about your order or any questions, please don’t hesitate to ask us.
translation.zh: 我们只是马恩岛的一家小企业，如果您的订单有问题，请随时联系我们。
translation.source: We are a small business based in the Isle of Man, and if you have any enquires about your order or any questions, please don’t hesitate to ask us.
translation.medium: 我们是一家位于马恩岛的小型企业，如果您对订单有任何疑问，请随时与我们联系。
translation.reference: 我们只是马恩岛的一家小企业，如果您的订单有问题，请随时联系我们。

translation.en: We will attempt to get back to you as quickly as possible but it may take up to 24 hours.
translation.zh: 我们会在 24 小时内尽快给您回复。
translation.source: We will attempt to get back to you as quickly as possible but it may take up to 24 hours.
translation.medium: 我们将尽快给您回复，但最多可能需要24小时。
translation.reference: 我们会在 24 小时内尽快给您回复。

translation.en: If you haven’t received a response after this time, please send the message again in case we have overlooked it or on the rare occasion when there is a problem with the eBay Messages.
translation.zh: 如果您在 24 小时后没有收到回复，请再次发送消息，以防我们漏掉了消息，或者 eBay 消息出现问题（虽然这种情况很少见）。
translation.source: If you haven’t received a response after this time, please send the message again in case we have overlooked it or on the rare occasion when there is a problem with the eBay Messages.
translation.medium: 如果您在此时间后仍未收到回复，请再次发送消息，以防我们忽略了它，或者在极少数情况下eBay消息出现问题。
translation.reference: 如果您在 24 小时后没有收到回复，请再次发送消息，以防我们漏掉了消息，或者 eBay 消息出现问题（虽然这种情况很少见）。

translation.en: I am just checking this information for you, I won't be long
translation.zh: 我只是查一下信息，不会太久的
translation.source: I am just checking this information for you, I won't be long
translation.medium: 我只是為你檢查一下這些資訊，不會花太長時間。
translation.reference: 我只是查一下信息，不会太久的

translation.en: I have checked and this would be contactless so they would not be able to bring the item to your property I am afraid, I do apologise about this
translation.zh: 我查过了，只能选择无接触式投递，所以他们不能把包裹送到您家里，我很抱歉
translation.source: I have checked and this would be contactless so they would not be able to bring the item to your property I am afraid, I do apologise about this
translation.medium: 我已經檢查了，這將是無接觸的，所以他們不能把物品帶到您的物業，恐怕我要對此表示道歉。
translation.reference: 我查过了，只能选择无接触式投递，所以他们不能把包裹送到您家里，我很抱歉

translation.en: Scholz, Polish prime minister discuss migration, energy, EU
translation.zh: 奥拉夫•肖尔茨 (Olaf Scholz) 与波兰总理讨论移民、能源和欧盟问题
translation.source: Scholz, Polish prime minister discuss migration, energy, EU
translation.medium: 史高茨和波兰总理讨论移民、能源和欧盟问题。
translation.reference: 奥拉夫•肖尔茨 (Olaf Scholz) 与波兰总理讨论移民、能源和欧盟问题

translation.en: Germany's new chancellor, Olaf Scholz came to Warsaw Sunday for talks with Polish Prime Minister Mateusz Morawiecki about migration, energy, European Union matters and tensions east of the bloc's border.
translation.zh: 德国新任总理奥拉夫•肖尔茨星期天抵达华沙，与波兰总理马泰乌什·莫拉维茨基 (Mateusz Morawiecki) 就移民、能源、欧盟事务以及欧盟东部边境的紧张局势举行会谈。
translation.source: Germany's new chancellor, Olaf Scholz came to Warsaw Sunday for talks with Polish Prime Minister Mateusz Morawiecki about migration, energy, European Union matters and tensions east of the bloc's border.
translation.medium: 德国新总理奥拉夫·肖尔茨周日前往华沙，与波兰总理马特乌斯·莫拉维基举行会谈，讨论移民、能源、欧盟事务以及欧盟边界以东的紧张局势。
translation.reference: 德国新任总理奥拉夫•肖尔茨星期天抵达华沙，与波兰总理马泰乌什·莫拉维茨基 (Mateusz Morawiecki) 就移民、能源、欧盟事务以及欧盟东部边境的紧张局势举行会谈。

translation.en: He was greeted by Morawiecki, with military honors, in front of the Polish premier's office.
translation.zh: 他在波兰总理办公室前受到莫拉维茨基的军事礼遇。
translation.source: He was greeted by Morawiecki, with military honors, in front of the Polish premier's office.
translation.medium: 他在波兰总理办公室前受到莫拉维奇的军事仪式欢迎。
translation.reference: 他在波兰总理办公室前受到莫拉维茨基的军事礼遇。

translation.en: It was one of Scholz's early visits after he was sworn in with his coalition Cabinet on Wednesday.
translation.zh: 这是肖尔茨周三宣誓就职联合内阁后首批访问目的地之一。
translation.source: It was one of Scholz's early visits after he was sworn in with his coalition Cabinet on Wednesday.
translation.medium: 这是肖尔茨在周三宣誓就职组建联合内阁后的早期访问之一。
translation.reference: 这是肖尔茨周三宣誓就职联合内阁后首批访问目的地之一。

translation.en: Poland is a vocal opponent of the Nord Stream 2 pipeline that will carry Russian gas directly to Germany saying it makes Europe dependent on Russia's deliveries, and exposes it to pressure from Moscow.
translation.zh: 波兰直言不讳地反对将俄罗斯天然气通过北溪 2 号管道直接输送到德国，称这会使欧洲依赖于俄罗斯的天然气输送，并使其面临来自莫斯科的压力。
translation.source: Poland is a vocal opponent of the Nord Stream 2 pipeline that will carry Russian gas directly to Germany saying it makes Europe dependent on Russia's deliveries, and exposes it to pressure from Moscow.
translation.medium: 波兰强烈反对北溪2号管道，该管道将直接将俄罗斯天然气运送至德国，称这使欧洲依赖俄罗斯的交付，并使其面临来自莫斯科的压力。
translation.reference: 波兰直言不讳地反对将俄罗斯天然气通过北溪 2 号管道直接输送到德国，称这会使欧洲依赖于俄罗斯的天然气输送，并使其面临来自莫斯科的压力。

translation.en: Germany's regulator has suspended the approval procedure for the completed pipeline because of legal issues.
translation.zh: 由于法律问题，德国监管机构暂停了对已完工管道的审批程序。
translation.source: Germany's regulator has suspended the approval procedure for the completed pipeline because of legal issues.
translation.medium: 德国监管机构因法律问题已暂停对已完成管道的批准程序。
translation.reference: 由于法律问题，德国监管机构暂停了对已完工管道的审批程序。

translation.en: The government in Warsaw is also involved in an intensifying dispute with the European Commission, the EU's executive arm, which is withholding pandemic recovery funds from Poland saying the government's policies erode judicial independence there.
translation.zh: 华沙政府也卷入了与欧盟执行机构欧盟委员会日益激烈的争端，欧盟委员会拒绝向波兰提供疫情恢复资金，称政府的政策侵蚀了波兰的司法独立。
translation.source: The government in Warsaw is also involved in an intensifying dispute with the European Commission, the EU's executive arm, which is withholding pandemic recovery funds from Poland saying the government's policies erode judicial independence there.
translation.medium: 华沙政府与欧盟行政机构欧洲委员会也卷入了日益激烈的争端，欧委会拒绝向波兰提供疫情复苏资金，称该政府的政策破坏了波兰的司法独立性。
translation.reference: 华沙政府也卷入了与欧盟执行机构欧盟委员会日益激烈的争端，欧盟委员会拒绝向波兰提供疫情恢复资金，称政府的政策侵蚀了波兰的司法独立。

translation.en: Scholz and Morawiecki are also to discuss complex bilateral relations under Germany's new government.
translation.zh: Scholz 和 Morawiecki 还将讨论德国新政府领导下复杂的双边关系。
translation.source: Scholz and Morawiecki are also to discuss complex bilateral relations under Germany's new government.
translation.medium: 施罗茨和莫拉维奇也将在德国新政府下讨论复杂的双边关系。
translation.reference: Scholz 和 Morawiecki 还将讨论德国新政府领导下复杂的双边关系。

translation.en: The good neighborly ties are still overshadowed by World War II, especially under Poland's current right-wing government, which is saying Germany owes Poland compensation for wartime damages.
translation.zh: 两国的睦邻关系仍然被二战阴影所笼罩，特别是在波兰现任右翼政府的领导下，他们说德国应向波兰支付战时损害赔偿。
translation.source: The good neighborly ties are still overshadowed by World War II, especially under Poland's current right-wing government, which is saying Germany owes Poland compensation for wartime damages.
translation.medium: 二战仍然笼罩着良好的邻里关系，尤其是在波兰目前的右翼政府下，他们声称德国应该为战时破坏向波兰赔偿。
translation.reference: 两国的睦邻关系仍然被二战阴影所笼罩，特别是在波兰现任右翼政府的领导下，他们说德国应向波兰支付战时损害赔偿。

translation.en: Agnieszka Lada-Konefal, the deputy director of the German Institute for Polish Affairs in Darmstadt, Germany, expects Scholz's government to continue dialogue and contact with Poland, which is an important member on EU's eastern flank and Germany's fifth-largest trading partner.
translation.zh: 位于德国达姆施塔特的德国波兰事务研究所副所长 Agnieszka Lada-Konefal 希望肖尔茨政府继续与波兰进行对话和接触，波兰是欧盟东翼的重要成员，也是德国第五大贸易伙伴。
translation.source: Agnieszka Lada-Konefal, the deputy director of the German Institute for Polish Affairs in Darmstadt, Germany, expects Scholz's government to continue dialogue and contact with Poland, which is an important member on EU's eastern flank and Germany's fifth-largest trading partner.
translation.medium: 阿格尼斯卡·拉达-科内法尔（Agnieszka Lada-Konefal）是德国达姆施塔特德国波兰事务研究所的副所长，她预计施尔茨政府将继续与波兰进行对话和接触，波兰是欧盟东部边缘的重要成员国，也是德国第五大贸易伙伴。
translation.reference: 位于德国达姆施塔特的德国波兰事务研究所副所长 Agnieszka Lada-Konefal 希望肖尔茨政府继续与波兰进行对话和接触，波兰是欧盟东翼的重要成员，也是德国第五大贸易伙伴。

translation.en: The visit comes 30 years after the two parliaments ratified a treaty on good neighborly relations and friendly cooperation.
translation.zh: 30 年前，两国议会批准了睦邻友好合作条约。
translation.source: The visit comes 30 years after the two parliaments ratified a treaty on good neighborly relations and friendly cooperation.
translation.medium: 这次访问是两个议会批准友好邻里关系和友好合作条约30年后的访问。
translation.reference: 30 年前，两国议会批准了睦邻友好合作条约。

translation.en: Germany's new foreign minister, Annalena Baerbock, was in Warsaw on Friday.
translation.zh: 德国新任外交部长贝尔博克 (Annalena Baerbock) 周五在华沙。
translation.source: Germany's new foreign minister, Annalena Baerbock, was in Warsaw on Friday.
translation.medium: 德国新任外交部长安娜莱娜·巴尔博克周五在华沙。
translation.reference: 德国新任外交部长贝尔博克 (Annalena Baerbock) 周五在华沙。

translation.en: She voiced Germany's support for Poland which has sealed its eastern frontier to migrants who are apparently encouraged by the Belarus government to seek illegal passage.
translation.zh: 她表达了德国对波兰的支持，波兰封锁了东部边境，阻止明显受到白俄罗斯政府鼓励的非法移民通过。
translation.source: She voiced Germany's support for Poland which has sealed its eastern frontier to migrants who are apparently encouraged by the Belarus government to seek illegal passage.
translation.medium: 她表达了德国对波兰的支持，波兰已经封锁了其东部边境，以阻止被白俄罗斯政府鼓励寻求非法通道的移民。
translation.reference: 她表达了德国对波兰的支持，波兰封锁了东部边境，阻止明显受到白俄罗斯政府鼓励的非法移民通过。

translation.en: She also called for humanitarian treatment of the migrants stuck at the border.
translation.zh: 她还呼吁给予滞留在边境的移民人道主义待遇。
translation.source: She also called for humanitarian treatment of the migrants stuck at the border.
translation.medium: 她还呼吁对被困在边境的移民给予人道待遇。
translation.reference: 她还呼吁给予滞留在边境的移民人道主义待遇。

translation.en: Poland and the EU say the government of Belarusian President Aleksander Lukashenko is seeking to destabilize the bloc by encouraging migration into its countries.
translation.zh: 波兰和欧盟表示，白俄罗斯总统卢卡申科鼓励移民进入波兰，试图破坏欧盟的稳定。
translation.source: Poland and the EU say the government of Belarusian President Aleksander Lukashenko is seeking to destabilize the bloc by encouraging migration into its countries.
translation.medium: 波兰和欧盟表示，白俄罗斯总统亚历山大·卢卡申科政府正试图通过鼓励移民进入其国家来破坏欧盟的稳定。
translation.reference: 波兰和欧盟表示，白俄罗斯总统卢卡申科鼓励移民进入波兰，试图破坏欧盟的稳定。

translation.en: On Friday, Scholz met with French President Emmanuel Macron in Paris and later with EU and NATO officials in Brussels.
translation.zh: 星期五，肖尔茨在巴黎会见了法国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙 (Emmanuel Macron)，随后在布鲁塞尔会见了欧盟和北约官员。
translation.source: On Friday, Scholz met with French President Emmanuel Macron in Paris and later with EU and NATO officials in Brussels.
translation.medium: 周五，施罗茨在巴黎会见了法国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙，随后又在布鲁塞尔会见了欧盟和北约官员。
translation.reference: 星期五，肖尔茨在巴黎会见了法国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙 (Emmanuel Macron)，随后在布鲁塞尔会见了欧盟和北约官员。

translation.en: Scholz, a center-left politician, became Germany's ninth post-World War II chancellor, opening a new era for the EU's most populous nation and largest economy after Angela Merkel's 16-year tenure.
translation.zh: 中左翼政治家肖尔茨成为二战后德国第九位总理，为这个欧盟人口最多的国家和最大经济体开启了一个新时代，安格拉·默克尔 (Angela Merkel) 担任德国总理16年。
translation.source: Scholz, a center-left politician, became Germany's ninth post-World War II chancellor, opening a new era for the EU's most populous nation and largest economy after Angela Merkel's 16-year tenure.
translation.medium: 史高茨，一位中左政治家，在安格拉·默克尔16年任期之后，成为德国第九位二战后的总理，为欧盟人口最多的国家和最大的经济体开启了一个新时代。
translation.reference: 中左翼政治家肖尔茨成为二战后德国第九位总理，为这个欧盟人口最多的国家和最大经济体开启了一个新时代，安格拉·默克尔 (Angela Merkel) 担任德国总理16年。

translation.en: His government is made up of a coalition of his center-left Social Democrats, the environmentalist Greens and the pro-business Free Democrats.
translation.zh: 他的政府是由中间偏左的社会民主党、环保主义者绿党和亲商业的自由民主党组成的联盟。
translation.source: His government is made up of a coalition of his center-left Social Democrats, the environmentalist Greens and the pro-business Free Democrats.
translation.medium: 他的政府由他的中左社会民主党、环保主义者绿党和亲商业自由民主党组成联盟。
translation.reference: 他的政府是由中间偏左的社会民主党、环保主义者绿党和亲商业的自由民主党组成的联盟。

translation.en: The Shuttlebays of the Enterprise-D
translation.zh: 进取号 D 的穿梭机
translation.source: The Shuttlebays of the Enterprise-D
translation.medium: 企業D的船塢
translation.reference: 进取号 D 的穿梭机

translation.en: The **Enterprise-D** of *The Next Generation* had **three** shuttlebays.
translation.zh: *下一代*中的**进取号 D** 有**三架**穿梭机。
translation.source: The **Enterprise-D** of *The Next Generation* had **three** shuttlebays.
translation.medium: 《下一代》的“企业号D”有三个穿梭舱。
translation.reference: *下一代*中的**进取号 D** 有**三架**穿梭机。

translation.en: On the show, we always see Shuttlebays 2 and 3 on decks 12 and 13.
translation.zh: 我们在剧中总是看到 2 和 3 号穿梭机停放在 12 号和 13 号甲板上。
translation.source: On the show, we always see Shuttlebays 2 and 3 on decks 12 and 13.
translation.medium: 在节目中，我们总是看到12和13甲板上的2号和3号舱门。
translation.reference: 我们在剧中总是看到 2 和 3 号穿梭机停放在 12 号和 13 号甲板上。

translation.en: These two shuttlebays were represented by a full-size studio set that could house full-size shuttlecraft sets.
translation.zh: 这两架穿梭机展示过全尺寸内景，可以放下整个航天飞机。
translation.source: These two shuttlebays were represented by a full-size studio set that could house full-size shuttlecraft sets.
translation.medium: 这两个穿梭坞由一个可以容纳全尺寸穿梭机设置的全尺寸摄影棚模型来表示。
translation.reference: 这两架穿梭机展示过全尺寸内景，可以放下整个航天飞机。

translation.en: I always loved it when episodes would showcase the twin shuttlebays at the back of the mid-section, neck, or whatever you want to call it.
translation.zh: 我特别喜欢看剧中从这两架穿梭机中间部分（或者颈部，或者随便您怎么叫它）的后面呈现它们并排停放的场景。
translation.source: I always loved it when episodes would showcase the twin shuttlebays at the back of the mid-section, neck, or whatever you want to call it.
translation.medium: 我一直很喜欢当集数展示中段、颈部或者你想叫它什么的双翼舱时的样子。
translation.reference: 我特别喜欢看剧中从这两架穿梭机中间部分（或者颈部，或者随便您怎么叫它）的后面呈现它们并排停放的场景。

translation.en: How come we never saw the main shuttlebay?
translation.zh: 为什么我们从来没有看到过主穿梭机？
translation.source: How come we never saw the main shuttlebay?
translation.medium: 我们怎么从来没有看到主舱廊？
translation.reference: 为什么我们从来没有看到过主穿梭机？

translation.en: It was located below the main bridge on decks 3&4 and would presumably be a massive facility.
translation.zh: 主穿梭机在主桥下的 3 号和 4 号甲板上，可能是一个巨大的设施。
translation.source: It was located below the main bridge on decks 3&4 and would presumably be a massive facility.
translation.medium: 它位于主桥的3和4甲板下，可以想象会是一个巨大的设施。
translation.reference: 主穿梭机在主桥下的 3 号和 4 号甲板上，可能是一个巨大的设施。

translation.en: Instead of going there, the bridge crew would take a turbolift ride right past it all the way down to deck 13.
translation.zh: 桥上的工作人员没有去过这里，只是乘坐涡轮增压机直接经过它一直前往 13 号甲板。
translation.source: Instead of going there, the bridge crew would take a turbolift ride right past it all the way down to deck 13.
translation.medium: 代替去那里，船桥上的人员会乘坐一艘涡轮电梯，从上面一直驶到13甲板。
translation.reference: 桥上的工作人员没有去过这里，只是乘坐涡轮增压机直接经过它一直前往 13 号甲板。

translation.en: In the original *Star Trek*, a miniature set was built and used with a miniature shuttle to give the shuttlebay life.
translation.zh: 原版*星际迷航*制作了一个微型布景，还布置了一架微型航天飞机，让穿梭机看起来就像是真的一样。
translation.source: In the original *Star Trek*, a miniature set was built and used with a miniature shuttle to give the shuttlebay life.
translation.medium: 在原版《星际迷航》中，建造了一个微型舞台，并用微型穿梭机来给穿梭舱增添生机。
translation.reference: 原版*星际迷航*制作了一个微型布景，还布置了一架微型航天飞机，让穿梭机看起来就像是真的一样。

translation.en: Characters were sometimes seen talking by doors that opened into the shuttlebay with the miniature set and shuttle superimposed to give the ship scale and life.
translation.zh: 有时可以看到剧中的人物在打开的穿梭机门旁交谈，微型布景和航天飞机叠加在一起，让穿梭机有一种真实感。
translation.source: Characters were sometimes seen talking by doors that opened into the shuttlebay with the miniature set and shuttle superimposed to give the ship scale and life.
translation.medium: 有时可以看到角色在通往穿梭舱的门口谈话，小型船只和穿梭船被叠加在一起，给船只带来了尺度和生命力。
translation.reference: 有时可以看到剧中的人物在打开的穿梭机门旁交谈，微型布景和航天飞机叠加在一起，让穿梭机有一种真实感。

translation.en: Couldn't they have done this on TNG?
translation.zh: 在 TNG 中不能这么做吗？
translation.source: Couldn't they have done this on TNG?
translation.medium: 他们不能在TNG上做这件事吗？
translation.reference: 在 TNG 中不能这么做吗？

translation.en: We saw Worf and Data launch a shuttle from the main shuttlebay in "The Best of Both Worlds, Part II," but the shuttle launch was seen from inside the shuttle.
translation.zh: 在“The Best of Both Worlds（下）”中，我们看到 Worf 和 Data 从主穿梭机发射了一架航天飞机，但发射过程是从航天飞机内部看到的。
translation.source: We saw Worf and Data launch a shuttle from the main shuttlebay in "The Best of Both Worlds, Part II," but the shuttle launch was seen from inside the shuttle.
translation.medium: 我们在《双重世界第二部》中看到沃夫和达塔从主舱发射了一艘穿梭机，但是穿梭机的发射是从穿梭机内部看到的。
translation.reference: 在“The Best of Both Worlds（下）”中，我们看到 Worf 和 Data 从主穿梭机发射了一架航天飞机，但发射过程是从航天飞机内部看到的。

translation.en: We simply see the wall outside the window as the shuttle flies out, quickly replaced by space.
translation.zh: 当航天飞机飞出去时，我们只看到窗外的墙一闪而过，紧接着就看到了太空。
translation.source: We simply see the wall outside the window as the shuttle flies out, quickly replaced by space.
translation.medium: 我们只是看到窗外的墙壁随着穿梭飞出，很快就被太空所取代。
translation.reference: 当航天飞机飞出去时，我们只看到窗外的墙一闪而过，紧接着就看到了太空。

translation.en: The only time we saw the shuttlebay in full scale was in "Cause and Effect."
translation.zh: 唯一一次看到主穿梭机全身是在《Cause and Effect》中。
translation.source: The only time we saw the shuttlebay in full scale was in "Cause and Effect."
translation.medium: 我们唯一一次在“因果抉择”中看到完整的船坞是。
translation.reference: 唯一一次看到主穿梭机全身是在《Cause and Effect》中。

translation.en: We see a space shot of the roll door opening, decompressing the main shuttlebay, and we get a quick glimpse of inside along with a few parked shuttles.
translation.zh: 我们看到太空发射时，卷帘门打开，给主穿梭机减压，里面停放着一些航天飞机，但这个镜头只是一闪而过。
translation.source: We see a space shot of the roll door opening, decompressing the main shuttlebay, and we get a quick glimpse of inside along with a few parked shuttles.
translation.medium: 我们看到一张太空照片，卷门打开，主舱舱门解压，我们还可以快速瞥见里面，还有几艘停靠的穿梭机。
translation.reference: 我们看到太空发射时，卷帘门打开，给主穿梭机减压，里面停放着一些航天飞机，但这个镜头只是一闪而过。

translation.en: Any ideas as to why the main shuttlebay was never seen outside these two instances?
translation.zh: 除了这两处情节，再也没有出现过主穿梭机了，您知道是为什么吗？
translation.source: Any ideas as to why the main shuttlebay was never seen outside these two instances?
translation.medium: 为什么主舱门从未在这两个实例之外被看到？有什么想法吗？
translation.reference: 除了这两处情节，再也没有出现过主穿梭机了，您知道是为什么吗？

translation.en: My apologies again for the inconvenience this has caused you.
translation.zh: 给您带来不便，再次表示歉意。
translation.source: My apologies again for the inconvenience this has caused you.
translation.medium: 我再次为给您带来的不便表示歉意。
translation.reference: 给您带来不便，再次表示歉意。

translation.en: We are still looking ways to improve our services and this will be noted as a feedback to one of our valued customer.
translation.zh: 您是我们的重要客户，我们要告诉您的是，我们一直在努力改善服务。
translation.source: We are still looking ways to improve our services and this will be noted as a feedback to one of our valued customer.
translation.medium: 我们仍在寻找改善我们服务的方法，这将被记录为我们尊贵客户的反馈之一。
translation.reference: 您是我们的重要客户，我们要告诉您的是，我们一直在努力改善服务。

translation.en: Thank you - so this query is with warehouse as stated in yesterdays chat, we have to await the reply to the investigation.
translation.zh: 谢谢，我们昨天说过，这个问题要与仓库核实，现在正在等待答复。
translation.source: Thank you - so this query is with warehouse as stated in yesterdays chat, we have to await the reply to the investigation.
translation.medium: 謝謝 - 所以這個查詢是與昨天聊天中提到的倉庫，我們必須等待調查的答复。
translation.reference: 谢谢，我们昨天说过，这个问题要与仓库核实，现在正在等待答复。

translation.en: As soon as we have heard back, tis is when you will be emailed
translation.zh: 我们一收到回复，就会给您发邮件
translation.source: As soon as we have heard back, tis is when you will be emailed
translation.medium: 一旦我们收到回复，就会给您发送电子邮件。
translation.reference: 我们一收到回复，就会给您发邮件

translation.en: I case the screen frozen one more time, please process this steps:
translation.zh: 如果屏幕又一次冻结，请执行以下步骤：
translation.source: I case the screen frozen one more time, please process this steps:
translation.medium: 如果屏幕再次出现冻结，请按照以下步骤处理：
translation.reference: 如果屏幕又一次冻结，请执行以下步骤：

translation.en: Connect your eReader to a power source by doing one of the following:
translation.zh: 执行以下操作之一，将您的电子阅读器连接到电源：
translation.source: Connect your eReader to a power source by doing one of the following:
translation.medium: 使用一个USB电源适配器将电子阅读器连接到电源源，或者
translation.reference: 执行以下操作之一，将您的电子阅读器连接到电源：

translation.en: - Turn on your computer and connect the included USB power cord to your computer first, and then your eReader.
translation.zh: - 打开电脑，把随附的 USB 线先连接到电脑，再连接到电子阅读器。
translation.source: - Turn on your computer and connect the included USB power cord to your computer first, and then your eReader.
translation.medium: 打开你的电脑，先将随附的USB电源线连接到电脑，然后再连接到电子阅读器。
translation.reference: - 打开电脑，把随附的 USB 线先连接到电脑，再连接到电子阅读器。

translation.en: - Plug the wall charger (not included) to a power outlet, and then connect your eReader to the wall charger.
translation.zh: - 把充电器（未提供）插到插座上，再把电子阅读器连接到充电器。
translation.source: - Plug the wall charger (not included) to a power outlet, and then connect your eReader to the wall charger.
translation.medium: 把墙壁充电器（未包括在内）插入电源插座，然后把你的电子阅读器连接到墙壁充电器上。
translation.reference: - 把充电器（未提供）插到插座上，再把电子阅读器连接到充电器。

translation.en: Press and hold the power button until the power light on the top-right corner of your eReader turns off.
translation.zh: 按住电源按钮，直到电子阅读器右上方的电源灯灭掉。
translation.source: Press and hold the power button until the power light on the top-right corner of your eReader turns off.
translation.medium: 按住电源按钮，直到你的电子阅读器上右上角的电源灯熄灭。
translation.reference: 按住电源按钮，直到电子阅读器右上方的电源灯灭掉。

translation.en: You'll see a 'Powered off' screen when your eReader is turned off.
translation.zh: 在电子阅读器关闭时，您将看到“关机”按钮。
translation.source: You'll see a 'Powered off' screen when your eReader is turned off.
translation.medium: 你在关闭电子阅读器时会看到一个“已关闭”的屏幕。
translation.reference: 在电子阅读器关闭时，您将看到“关机”按钮。

translation.en: Release the power button.
translation.zh: 松开电源按钮。
translation.source: Release the power button.
translation.medium: 釋放電源按鈕。
translation.reference: 松开电源按钮。

translation.en: Press and hold the power button on your eReader for 30 seconds.
translation.zh: 按住电子阅读器上的电源按钮 30 秒。
translation.source: Press and hold the power button on your eReader for 30 seconds.
translation.medium: 按住您的电子阅读器上的电源按钮30秒。
translation.reference: 按住电子阅读器上的电源按钮 30 秒。

translation.en: Wait for the Restore screen to appear.
translation.zh: 等待“恢复”屏幕出现。
translation.source: Wait for the Restore screen to appear.
translation.medium: 等待恢复屏幕出现。
translation.reference: 等待“恢复”屏幕出现。

translation.en: Release the power button.
translation.zh: 松开电源按钮。
translation.source: Release the power button.
translation.medium: 釋放電源按鈕。
translation.reference: 松开电源按钮。

translation.en: Your eReader screen will turn black and begin the restoring process.
translation.zh: 您的电子阅读器屏幕将变黑，并开始恢复过程。
translation.source: Your eReader screen will turn black and begin the restoring process.
translation.medium: 你的电子阅读器屏幕将变黑，并开始恢复过程。
translation.reference: 您的电子阅读器屏幕将变黑，并开始恢复过程。

translation.en: Is there anything else I can help you with?
translation.zh: 还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？
translation.source: Is there anything else I can help you with?
translation.medium: 你还需要我帮忙什么吗？
translation.reference: 还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？

translation.en: I see it all the time in my line of work.
translation.zh: 我在工作中经常看到这种情况。
translation.source: I see it all the time in my line of work.
translation.medium: 我在我的工作领域里经常看到这个。
translation.reference: 我在工作中经常看到这种情况。

translation.en: And it doesn’t even have to be life or death to be frustrating.
translation.zh: 人不一定在面对生死问题时才会绝望。
translation.source: And it doesn’t even have to be life or death to be frustrating.
translation.medium: 这甚至不一定是生死攸关，也可能令人沮丧。
translation.reference: 人不一定在面对生死问题时才会绝望。

translation.en: Had a recent patient who needed a very specific knee procedure to walk normally and improve quality of life.
translation.zh: 最近，我有个病人需要做一个非常特殊的膝盖手术，才能正常行走和提高生活质量。
translation.source: Had a recent patient who needed a very specific knee procedure to walk normally and improve quality of life.
translation.medium: 最近有一位病人需要一种非常特殊的膝盖手术来正常行走并改善生活质量。
translation.reference: 最近，我有个病人需要做一个非常特殊的膝盖手术，才能正常行走和提高生活质量。

translation.en: Peer to peer failed.
translation.zh: 但被互助保险拒绝了。
translation.source: Peer to peer failed.
translation.medium: 对等失败了。
translation.reference: 但被互助保险拒绝了。

translation.en: Insurance says it’s not medically necessary.
translation.zh: 保险公司说这不是必须的医疗手术。
translation.source: Insurance says it’s not medically necessary.
translation.medium: 保险公司说这不是医疗必需品。
translation.reference: 保险公司说这不是必须的医疗手术。

translation.en: We appeal.
translation.zh: 我们提出申诉。
translation.source: We appeal.
translation.medium: 我们呼吁。
translation.reference: 我们提出申诉。

translation.en: They say no again.
translation.zh: 他们又拒绝了。
translation.source: They say no again.
translation.medium: 他們又不說了。
translation.reference: 他们又拒绝了。

translation.en: We go to third party appeal.
translation.zh: 我们向第三方上诉。
translation.source: We go to third party appeal.
translation.medium: 我们去申请第三方上诉。
translation.reference: 我们向第三方上诉。

translation.en: We submit all the pertinent medical research supporting the need for the procedure.
translation.zh: 我们提交了所有相关的医学研究，表明这项手术的必要性。
translation.source: We submit all the pertinent medical research supporting the need for the procedure.
translation.medium: 我们提交了所有支持这项手术所需的相关医学研究。
translation.reference: 我们提交了所有相关的医学研究，表明这项手术的必要性。

translation.en: We even included the second opinion of a different surgeon outside of our program — yeah, he recommends the procedure.
translation.zh: 我们甚至还提交了另一位与我们的项目无关的外科医生的意见——是的，他也推荐了这个手术。
translation.source: We even included the second opinion of a different surgeon outside of our program — yeah, he recommends the procedure.
translation.medium: 我们甚至包括了我们计划之外另一位外科医生的第二个意见——是的，他建议进行该手术。
translation.reference: 我们甚至还提交了另一位与我们的项目无关的外科医生的意见——是的，他也推荐了这个手术。

translation.en: 24 hours later, they hit us back with the final “No.
translation.zh: 24 小时后，他们的最终答复仍然是：“不同意。
translation.source: 24 hours later, they hit us back with the final “No.
translation.medium: 24小时后，他们用最终的“不”回击我们。
translation.reference: 24 小时后，他们的最终答复仍然是：“不同意。

translation.en: Not medically necessary.”
translation.zh: 这在医学上不是必要的。”
translation.source: Not medically necessary.”
translation.medium: 不是医疗必需的。
translation.reference: 这在医学上不是必要的。”

translation.en: My surgeon flips his shit and is like “FINE!
translation.zh: 我的外科医生崩溃了，说“好吧！
translation.source: My surgeon flips his shit and is like “FINE!
translation.medium: 我的外科医生大发雷霆，就像说“好吧！”
translation.reference: 我的外科医生崩溃了，说“好吧！

translation.en: But you’re going to fucking tell me which procedure you would recommend, because I don’t know another one that is gonna help this poor kid”.
translation.zh: 但你他妈得告诉我你推荐哪种手术啊，因为我不知道还能怎么帮这个可怜的孩子”。
translation.source: But you’re going to fucking tell me which procedure you would recommend, because I don’t know another one that is gonna help this poor kid”.
translation.medium: 但你要告訴我你會推薦哪個程序，因為我不知道另一個會幫助這個可憐孩子的程序。
translation.reference: 但你他妈得告诉我你推荐哪种手术啊，因为我不知道还能怎么帮这个可怜的孩子”。

translation.en: Of course, they don’t.
translation.zh: 他们当然不会这样做了。
translation.source: Of course, they don’t.
translation.medium: 他們當然不會。
translation.reference: 他们当然不会这样做了。

translation.en: And this kid is screwed.
translation.zh: 这孩子完蛋了。
translation.source: And this kid is screwed.
translation.medium: 这孩子完蛋了。
translation.reference: 这孩子完蛋了。

translation.en: No other option.
translation.zh: 他没有其他的选择。
translation.source: No other option.
translation.medium: 沒有其他選擇。
translation.reference: 他没有其他的选择。

translation.en: As it turns out this procedure is generally hated by insurance because it’s pretty expensive.
translation.zh: 事实证明，保险公司普遍不喜欢这种手术，因为它太贵了。
translation.source: As it turns out this procedure is generally hated by insurance because it’s pretty expensive.
translation.medium: 事实证明，保险公司非常讨厌这个程序，因为它相当昂贵。
translation.reference: 事实证明，保险公司普遍不喜欢这种手术，因为它太贵了。

translation.en: We always have to fight for it, but they’ll usually agree after an appeal.
translation.zh: 我们一般都会申诉，而且都得到了他们的同意。
translation.source: We always have to fight for it, but they’ll usually agree after an appeal.
translation.medium: 我们总是必须为此而战，但在呼吁之后，他们通常会同意。
translation.reference: 我们一般都会申诉，而且都得到了他们的同意。

translation.en: Not this time.
translation.zh: 但这一次不行。
translation.source: Not this time.
translation.medium: 不是这次。
translation.reference: 但这一次不行。

translation.en: The system is so broken.
translation.zh: 这个体制真是让人失望。
translation.source: The system is so broken.
translation.medium: 系统太坏了。
translation.reference: 这个体制真是让人失望。

translation.en: Iowa Santa retires after 50 years
translation.zh: 爱荷华州圣诞老人工作 50 年后退休
translation.source: Iowa Santa retires after 50 years
translation.medium: 爱荷华的圣诞老人退休了，历时50年。
translation.reference: 爱荷华州圣诞老人工作 50 年后退休

translation.en: An Iowa Santa who has been making children smile for 50 years says he's ready to hang up the red suit and enjoy a quieter Christmas.
translation.zh: 爱荷华州的一位圣诞老人 50 年来一直给孩子们带来欢声笑语，他说他已经准备好收起红色衣服，享受一个安静的圣诞节。
translation.source: An Iowa Santa who has been making children smile for 50 years says he's ready to hang up the red suit and enjoy a quieter Christmas.
translation.medium: 一位在爱荷华州让孩子们笑容灿烂50年的圣诞老人说他准备挂上红色衣服，享受一个更安静的圣诞节。
translation.reference: 爱荷华州的一位圣诞老人 50 年来一直给孩子们带来欢声笑语，他说他已经准备好收起红色衣服，享受一个安静的圣诞节。

translation.en: Dave Stoufer revealed health issues and age-related issues had led to his decision to retire from the "longest job" he had ever had.
translation.zh: 戴夫·斯托弗 (Dave Stoufer) 透露，由于健康和年龄问题，他决定从他做过的“时间最长的工作岗位”退休。
translation.source: Dave Stoufer revealed health issues and age-related issues had led to his decision to retire from the "longest job" he had ever had.
translation.medium: 戴夫·斯托弗披露，健康问题和年龄相关的问题导致他决定退休，这是他拥有的“最长的工作”。
translation.reference: 戴夫·斯托弗 (Dave Stoufer) 透露，由于健康和年龄问题，他决定从他做过的“时间最长的工作岗位”退休。

translation.en: His wife Rachel Nicola said while she was very proud of the work her husband had done to bring joy to so many people, she was looking forward to having more time to celebrate Christmas with him.
translation.zh: 他的妻子雷切尔·尼古拉 (Rachel Nicola) 表示，虽然她为丈夫给这么多人带来欢乐而感到自豪，但她也希望能有更多时间和他一起庆祝圣诞节。
translation.source: His wife Rachel Nicola said while she was very proud of the work her husband had done to bring joy to so many people, she was looking forward to having more time to celebrate Christmas with him.
translation.medium: 他的妻子瑞切尔·尼古拉说，虽然她为丈夫为许多人带来欢乐所做的工作感到非常自豪，但她期待着能有更多时间和他一起庆祝圣诞节。
translation.reference: 他的妻子雷切尔·尼古拉 (Rachel Nicola) 表示，虽然她为丈夫给这么多人带来欢乐而感到自豪，但她也希望能有更多时间和他一起庆祝圣诞节。

translation.en: To repair your account on the #PRS_ORG# app, please follow the steps indicated below:
translation.zh: 要在 #PRS_ORG# App 上修复您的帐户，请执行以下步骤：
translation.source: To repair your account on the #PRS_ORG# app, please follow the steps indicated below:
translation.medium: Chinese: 要修复您在#PRS_ORG#应用程序上的帐户，请按照以下步骤操作：
translation.reference: 要在 #PRS_ORG# App 上修复您的帐户，请执行以下步骤：

translation.en: From the #PRS_ORG# App's home screen, tap More at the bottom of the screen.
translation.zh: 在 #PRS_ORG# App 的主屏幕上，点击屏幕底部的“更多”。
translation.source: From the #PRS_ORG# App's home screen, tap More at the bottom of the screen.
translation.medium: 在#PRS_ORG# App的主屏幕底部，点击更多。
translation.reference: 在 #PRS_ORG# App 的主屏幕上，点击屏幕底部的“更多”。

translation.en: Tap Repair your account.
translation.zh: 点击“修复帐户”。
translation.source: Tap Repair your account.
translation.medium: 点击“修复您的账户”。
translation.reference: 点击“修复帐户”。

translation.en: If you have a lot of items, it may take a while to repair your account.
translation.zh: 如果有很多书，修复帐户过程可能需要一点时间。
translation.source: If you have a lot of items, it may take a while to repair your account.
translation.medium: 如果你有很多項目，修復你的帳戶可能需要一段時間。
translation.reference: 如果有很多书，修复帐户过程可能需要一点时间。

translation.en: Go back to your Home screen, and tap Books or Audiobooks and see if the item that was missing appears.
translation.zh: 回到主屏幕，点击图书或音频书，然后查看是否显示缺少了的图书。
translation.source: Go back to your Home screen, and tap Books or Audiobooks and see if the item that was missing appears.
translation.medium: 回到你的主屏幕，点击书籍或有声书，看看是否出现了丢失的项目。
translation.reference: 回到主屏幕，点击图书或音频书，然后查看是否显示缺少了的图书。

translation.en: Oriflame Optimals Hydra Radiance Hydrating Day Cream + Hydra Radiance Moisturising Night Cream- Normal/Combination Skin
translation.zh: Oriflame Optimals Hydra 焕肤水润日霜 + Hydra 焕肤水润晚霜 - 中性/混合型肌肤
translation.source: Oriflame Optimals Hydra Radiance Hydrating Day Cream + Hydra Radiance Moisturising Night Cream- Normal/Combination Skin
translation.medium: 奥菲拉玛Optimals Hydra Radiance保湿日霜+ Hydra Radiance保湿夜霜- 普通/混合皮肤
translation.reference: Oriflame Optimals Hydra 焕肤水润日霜 + Hydra 焕肤水润晚霜 - 中性/混合型肌肤

translation.en: Formulated with a Swedish natural ingredient blend of Red Algae, Brown Algae and Aqua Minerals with Vitamin C and Anti-Pollution Active.
translation.zh: 含有瑞典天然成分混合物 - 红藻、褐藻和维生素 C 与抗污染活性的水矿物质。
translation.source: Formulated with a Swedish natural ingredient blend of Red Algae, Brown Algae and Aqua Minerals with Vitamin C and Anti-Pollution Active.
translation.medium: 由瑞典天然成分紅藻、褐藻和水溶性礦物質配製，並添加維生素C和抗污染活性成分。
translation.reference: 含有瑞典天然成分混合物 - 红藻、褐藻和维生素 C 与抗污染活性的水矿物质。

translation.en: Aqua Minerals keeps skin hydrated and supple.
translation.zh: 水矿物质可以保持肌肤的水润和柔软。
translation.source: Aqua Minerals keeps skin hydrated and supple.
translation.medium: 水晶礦物質能夠保持皮膚水分，使皮膚柔軟。
translation.reference: 水矿物质可以保持肌肤的水润和柔软。

translation.en: A hydrating day & night cream that leaves thirsty skin soft, supple and refreshed.
translation.zh: 保湿日霜和晚霜，让干渴的肌肤柔软、水润、清新。
translation.source: A hydrating day & night cream that leaves thirsty skin soft, supple and refreshed.
translation.medium: 一款滋润日夜面霜，让口渴的肌肤柔软，滑润，焕然一新。
translation.reference: 保湿日霜和晚霜，让干渴的肌肤柔软、水润、清新。

translation.en: Formulated with a Swedish natural ingredient blend of Red Algae, Brown Algae and Aqua Minerals with Vitamin C and Anti-pollution Active.
translation.zh: 含有瑞典天然成分混合物 - 红藻、褐藻和维生素 C 与抗污染活性的水矿物质。
translation.source: Formulated with a Swedish natural ingredient blend of Red Algae, Brown Algae and Aqua Minerals with Vitamin C and Anti-pollution Active.
translation.medium: 由瑞典天然成分紅藻、褐藻和水礦物質配製，並添加維生素C和抗污染活性成分。
translation.reference: 含有瑞典天然成分混合物 - 红藻、褐藻和维生素 C 与抗污染活性的水矿物质。

translation.en: The Major Credit Cards and Online bank Transfers are welcomed.
translation.zh: 接受主要信用卡和网上银行转账。
translation.source: The Major Credit Cards and Online bank Transfers are welcomed.
translation.medium: 欢迎使用主要信用卡和网上银行转账。
translation.reference: 接受主要信用卡和网上银行转账。

translation.en: Immediate Payment is required after the Winning Bid
translation.zh: 中标后需立即付款
translation.source: Immediate Payment is required after the Winning Bid
translation.medium: 竞拍获胜后需立即付款。
translation.reference: 中标后需立即付款

translation.en: Item will be shipped on the same day or next day of receiving full payment.
translation.zh: 收到全额付款当天或第二天发货。
translation.source: Item will be shipped on the same day or next day of receiving full payment.
translation.medium: 收到全额款项后，商品将于当天或次日发货。
translation.reference: 收到全额付款当天或第二天发货。

translation.en: Delivery time is approximately 10-21 working days (Bad weather can cause delays in delivery as well and may take more than a month to reach.).
translation.zh: 大约 10-21 个工作日后交货（恶劣的天气也会导致交货延迟，可能需要一个多月才能到达）。
translation.source: Delivery time is approximately 10-21 working days (Bad weather can cause delays in delivery as well and may take more than a month to reach.).
translation.medium: 送货时间大约为10-21个工作日（恶劣天气也可能导致延迟送货，可能超过一个月才能到达。）
translation.reference: 大约 10-21 个工作日后交货（恶劣的天气也会导致交货延迟，可能需要一个多月才能到达）。

translation.en: With an additional fee, we can arrange 5-11 business days express shipping courier (India post parcel.)
translation.zh: 可以安排 5-11 个工作日交货的快递（印度邮政包裹），但需额外收取费用。
translation.source: With an additional fee, we can arrange 5-11 business days express shipping courier (India post parcel.)
translation.medium: 附加费用，我们可以安排5-11个工作日的快递（印度邮政包裹）。
translation.reference: 可以安排 5-11 个工作日交货的快递（印度邮政包裹），但需额外收取费用。

translation.en: We offer a combined shipping discount for purchasing two or more items from our shop.
translation.zh: 若从我店购买两件或两件以上的商品，我们提供联合航运折扣。
translation.source: We offer a combined shipping discount for purchasing two or more items from our shop.
translation.medium: 我们店里购买两件或更多物品可享受组合运费折扣。
translation.reference: 若从我店购买两件或两件以上的商品，我们提供联合航运折扣。

translation.en: Just ask us by clicking the "Ask a question"
translation.zh: 单击“提问”即可联系我们
translation.source: Just ask us by clicking the "Ask a question"
translation.medium: 点击“提问”，就可以向我们提问。
translation.reference: 单击“提问”即可联系我们

translation.en: International Customers are responsible for their country’s custom duty and taxes.
translation.zh: 国际客户负责缴纳所在国家的关税和税收。
translation.source: International Customers are responsible for their country’s custom duty and taxes.
translation.medium: 国际客户需负担本国的关税和税收。
translation.reference: 国际客户负责缴纳所在国家的关税和税收。

translation.en: The Buyer Has To Responsible For The Return Shipping Charge.
translation.zh: 退货运费由买家负责。
translation.source: The Buyer Has To Responsible For The Return Shipping Charge.
translation.medium: 买方需要负责退货运费。
translation.reference: 退货运费由买家负责。

translation.en: Refund Can Be Made Only If A Replacement Is Not Available.
translation.zh: 在不提供换货服务的情况才能退款。
translation.source: Refund Can Be Made Only If A Replacement Is Not Available.
translation.medium: 除非没有替代品，否则不能退款。
translation.reference: 在不提供换货服务的情况才能退款。

translation.en: Any Charges On Shipping, Handling And Insurance Are Non-Refundable.
translation.zh: 邮费、处理费和保险不可退款。
translation.source: Any Charges On Shipping, Handling And Insurance Are Non-Refundable.
translation.medium: 任何关于运费、处理和保险的费用都不予退款。
translation.reference: 邮费、处理费和保险不可退款。

translation.en: We do not reimburse the shipping cost.
translation.zh: 我们不包邮。
translation.source: We do not reimburse the shipping cost.
translation.medium: 我们不报销运费。
translation.reference: 我们不包邮。

translation.en: Our priority is 100% customer satisfaction.
translation.zh: 让客户 100% 满意是我们的首要任务。
translation.source: Our priority is 100% customer satisfaction.
translation.medium: 我们的首要任务是100%的客户满意度。
translation.reference: 让客户 100% 满意是我们的首要任务。

translation.en: We give importance to our customers and deliver the highest quality of customer service.
translation.zh: 我们重视客户，努力提供最高质量的客户服务。
translation.source: We give importance to our customers and deliver the highest quality of customer service.
translation.medium: 我们重视我们的客户，提供最高质量的客户服务。
translation.reference: 我们重视客户，努力提供最高质量的客户服务。

translation.en: Ethics and integrity are the best part of our business, and we believe in delivering the best quality product and services at the best prices.
translation.zh: 我们秉持道德和诚信开展业务，致力于以最优惠的价格提供最好的产品和服务。
translation.source: Ethics and integrity are the best part of our business, and we believe in delivering the best quality product and services at the best prices.
translation.medium: 道德和诚信是我们业务的最佳组成部分，我们相信以最优惠的价格提供最优质的产品和服务。
translation.reference: 我们秉持道德和诚信开展业务，致力于以最优惠的价格提供最好的产品和服务。

translation.en: Moreover, we make it one of our central goals to answer questions as fast and as soon as possible.
translation.zh: 此外，尽快答复客户也是我们的中心目标之一。
translation.source: Moreover, we make it one of our central goals to answer questions as fast and as soon as possible.
translation.medium: 此外，我们把回答问题尽快尽可能快地作为我们的核心目标之一。
translation.reference: 此外，尽快答复客户也是我们的中心目标之一。

translation.en: Our priority is 100% customer satisfaction.
translation.zh: 让客户 100% 满意是我们的首要任务。
translation.source: Our priority is 100% customer satisfaction.
translation.medium: 我们的首要任务是100%的客户满意度。
translation.reference: 让客户 100% 满意是我们的首要任务。

translation.en: We aim to provide strictly 5-star service in all categories.
translation.zh: 我们的目标是在所有类别中提供 5 星级服务。
translation.source: We aim to provide strictly 5-star service in all categories.
translation.medium: 我们致力于在所有类别中提供严格的五星级服务。
translation.reference: 我们的目标是在所有类别中提供 5 星级服务。

translation.en: We maintain 100% customer satisfaction!
translation.zh: 我们至今维持着 100% 的客户满意度！
translation.source: We maintain 100% customer satisfaction!
translation.medium: 我们坚持100%的客户满意度！
translation.reference: 我们至今维持着 100% 的客户满意度！

translation.en: Your feedback is very important to us.
translation.zh: 您的反馈对我们非常重要。
translation.source: Your feedback is very important to us.
translation.medium: 您的反馈对我们非常重要。
translation.reference: 您的反馈对我们非常重要。

translation.en: When you receive the item, please leave us positive feedback.
translation.zh: 您在收到商品后，如果满意，请给我们一个好评。
translation.source: When you receive the item, please leave us positive feedback.
translation.medium: 收到物品后，请给我们留下正面反馈。
translation.reference: 您在收到商品后，如果满意，请给我们一个好评。

translation.en: Positive feedback is greatly appreciated, and we will also leave you positive feedback.
translation.zh: 我们感谢您的好评，同时我们也会给您好评。
translation.source: Positive feedback is greatly appreciated, and we will also leave you positive feedback.
translation.medium: 我们非常欢迎积极的反馈，我们也会给您留下积极的反馈。
translation.reference: 我们感谢您的好评，同时我们也会给您好评。

translation.en: If you are unhappy for any reason, please do not leave medium or negative Feedback.
translation.zh: 如果您因任何原因感到不满意，请不要给予中评或差评。
translation.source: If you are unhappy for any reason, please do not leave medium or negative Feedback.
translation.medium: 如果您因任何原因不满意，请不要留下中等或负面的反馈。
translation.reference: 如果您因任何原因感到不满意，请不要给予中评或差评。

translation.en: Give us a chance, and we will give our best.
translation.zh: 给我们一个帮您解决问题的机会。
translation.source: Give us a chance, and we will give our best.
translation.medium: 给我们一个机会，我们会尽力而为。
translation.reference: 给我们一个帮您解决问题的机会。

translation.en: We will quickly address the problem and give you a satisfactory answer.
translation.zh: 我们会尽快处理您遇到的问题，给您一个满意的答复。
translation.source: We will quickly address the problem and give you a satisfactory answer.
translation.medium: 我们会迅速解决这个问题，并给您一个满意的答案。
translation.reference: 我们会尽快处理您遇到的问题，给您一个满意的答复。

translation.en: I will be more than happy to assist you.
translation.zh: 我很高兴能帮到您。
translation.source: I will be more than happy to assist you.
translation.medium: 我很乐意帮助你。
translation.reference: 我很高兴能帮到您。

translation.en: Please allow me a few moments to verify your information
translation.zh: 请给我几分钟时间，我先验证您的信息。
translation.source: Please allow me a few moments to verify your information
translation.medium: 请允许我几分钟时间来核实您的信息。
translation.reference: 请给我几分钟时间，我先验证您的信息。

translation.en: In this case what you can try is connecting the device using different USB cords.
translation.zh: 在这种情况下，您可以尝试使用不同的 USB 线连接设备。
translation.source: In this case what you can try is connecting the device using different USB cords.
translation.medium: 在這種情況下，你可以嘗試使用不同的USB線來連接設備。
translation.reference: 在这种情况下，您可以尝试使用不同的 USB 线连接设备。

translation.en: Any generic micro-USB cord should work.
translation.zh: 任何普通的 Micro-USB 线都可以使用。
translation.source: Any generic micro-USB cord should work.
translation.medium: 任何普通的Micro-USB线都可以用。
translation.reference: 任何普通的 Micro-USB 线都可以使用。

translation.en: Also, please try using different USB ports in your computer
translation.zh: 此外，请尝试使用电脑上的不同 USB 端口。
translation.source: Also, please try using different USB ports in your computer
translation.medium: 请尝试在您的电脑上使用不同的USB端口。
translation.reference: 此外，请尝试使用电脑上的不同 USB 端口。

translation.en: From which country do you deliver?
translation.zh: 您从哪个国家发货？
translation.source: From which country do you deliver?
translation.medium: 你们从哪个国家发货？
translation.reference: 您从哪个国家发货？

translation.en: When is the package with us?
translation.zh: 我们什么时候能收到包裹？
translation.source: When is the package with us?
translation.medium: 什么时候包裹到我们这里？
translation.reference: 我们什么时候能收到包裹？

translation.en: They have many thanks for their help.
translation.zh: 他们对获得的帮助表示感谢。
translation.source: They have many thanks for their help.
translation.medium: 他們對他們的幫助表示感謝。
translation.reference: 他们对获得的帮助表示感谢。

translation.en: Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today and I hope I have managed to resolve your query, if you wouldn't mind rating our chat today based on my customer service skills I would really appreciate it, the rating button can be found on this chat.
translation.zh: 感谢您今天抽出时间与我交谈，希望我的答复能让您满意，如果您能抽空对我的客户服务技能进行评价，我将非常感激，评价按钮就在本次聊天中。
translation.source: Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today and I hope I have managed to resolve your query, if you wouldn't mind rating our chat today based on my customer service skills I would really appreciate it, the rating button can be found on this chat.
translation.medium: 謝謝你今天花時間和我聊天，希望我已經解決了你的問題，如果你不介意根據我的客戶服務技能給我們的聊天評分，我會非常感激，評分按鈕可以在這個聊天中找到。
translation.reference: 感谢您今天抽出时间与我交谈，希望我的答复能让您满意，如果您能抽空对我的客户服务技能进行评价，我将非常感激，评价按钮就在本次聊天中。

translation.en: Regrettably the prices of the items are as they show online, we cannot change or reduce this for you
translation.zh: 遗憾的是，这些商品的价格正如网上所示，我们无法改价或降价
translation.source: Regrettably the prices of the items are as they show online, we cannot change or reduce this for you
translation.medium: 遗憾的是，物品的价格就如网上所显示的那样，我们无法为您更改或降低这个价格。
translation.reference: 遗憾的是，这些商品的价格正如网上所示，我们无法改价或降价

translation.en: The lead times are as advertised on the website.
translation.zh: 交货期如网站上所示。
translation.source: The lead times are as advertised on the website.
translation.medium: 网站上所宣传的交货期如所述。
translation.reference: 交货期如网站上所示。

translation.en: As we do not carry stock then all items are made to order, shipped on to us here at #URL# and then sent onto yourselves.
translation.zh: 因为我们没有库存，所有商品均为定做，运到我们这里 (#URL#)，再邮寄给您。
translation.source: As we do not carry stock then all items are made to order, shipped on to us here at #URL# and then sent onto yourselves.
translation.medium: 我们不持有库存，所有货物都是定制的，在#URL#发货，然后再发送给您们。
translation.reference: 因为我们没有库存，所有商品均为定做，运到我们这里 (#URL#)，再邮寄给您。

translation.en: That is why we ask that you allow these lead times please.
translation.zh: 这就是我们要求留出备货期的原因。
translation.source: That is why we ask that you allow these lead times please.
translation.medium: 所以我们请求您请允许这些交货期。
translation.reference: 这就是我们要求留出备货期的原因。

translation.en: The lead time showing is when the next batch is due to arrive.
translation.zh: 备货期显示的是下一批货物到货的时间。
translation.source: The lead time showing is when the next batch is due to arrive.
translation.medium: 这个领先时间表示下一批货物何时到达。
translation.reference: 备货期显示的是下一批货物到货的时间。

translation.en: I try to call the rider but he does not understand me.
translation.zh: 我试着呼叫骑手了，但他不明白我的意思。
translation.source: I try to call the rider but he does not understand me.
translation.medium: 我试着打电话给骑手，但他不明白我。
translation.reference: 我试着呼叫骑手了，但他不明白我的意思。

translation.en: That is why please call the rider once he is near to the address place on the order using the app
translation.zh: 因此，请在骑手快到达订单上的地点时，使用 App 呼叫他
translation.source: That is why please call the rider once he is near to the address place on the order using the app
translation.medium: 請在騎士接近訂單地址時，使用應用程式打電話給他，這就是為什麼。
translation.reference: 因此，请在骑手快到达订单上的地点时，使用 App 呼叫他

translation.en: Which titles a re you missing?
translation.zh: 您缺少哪些标题？
translation.source: Which titles a re you missing?
translation.medium: 你缺少哪些标题？
translation.reference: 您缺少哪些标题？

translation.en: Please follow the steps indicated below to perform a sync repair on your #PRS_ORG# (you will need a Wi-Fi connection before you start):
translation.zh: 请按照下面的步骤在您的 #PRS_ORG# 上执行同步修复（开始之前需要连接 Wi-Fi）：
translation.source: Please follow the steps indicated below to perform a sync repair on your #PRS_ORG# (you will need a Wi-Fi connection before you start):
translation.medium: 请按照下面指示执行#PRS_ORG#的同步修复（在开始之前，您需要一个Wi-Fi连接）：
translation.reference: 请按照下面的步骤在您的 #PRS_ORG# 上执行同步修复（开始之前需要连接 Wi-Fi）：

translation.en: Go to your Home screen.
translation.zh: 进入主屏幕。
translation.source: Go to your Home screen.
translation.medium: 去你的主屏幕。
translation.reference: 进入主屏幕。

translation.en: Tap on the More icon at the bottom-right of the screen (3 horizontal lines).
translation.zh: 点击屏幕右下方的“更多”图标（3 条横线）。
translation.source: Tap on the More icon at the bottom-right of the screen (3 horizontal lines).
translation.medium: 在屏幕右下角的更多图标（3条水平线）上点击。
translation.reference: 点击屏幕右下方的“更多”图标（3 条横线）。

translation.en: Tap Settings.
translation.zh: 点击“设置”。
translation.source: Tap Settings.
translation.medium: 进入设置。
translation.reference: 点击“设置”。

translation.en: Tap Device information.
translation.zh: 点击“设备信息”。
translation.source: Tap Device information.
translation.medium: 点击设备信息。
translation.reference: 点击“设备信息”。

translation.en: Beside Repair/restore your #PRS_ORG# account, tap Repair/Restore.
translation.zh: 点击“修复/恢复您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户”旁边的“修复/恢复”。
translation.source: Beside Repair/restore your #PRS_ORG# account, tap Repair/Restore.
translation.medium: 除了修复/恢复您的#PRS_ORG#账户，请点击“修复/恢复”。
translation.reference: 点击“修复/恢复您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户”旁边的“修复/恢复”。

translation.en: Tap Repair now/Restore
translation.zh: 点击“立即修复/恢复”
translation.source: Tap Repair now/Restore
translation.medium: 现在点击修复/恢复
translation.reference: 点击“立即修复/恢复”

translation.en: When the syncing has completed, please tap again on Sync Now, to install any available upgrades.
translation.zh: 同步完成后，再次点击“立即同步”，以安装可用的升级。
translation.source: When the syncing has completed, please tap again on Sync Now, to install any available upgrades.
translation.medium: 同步完成后，请再次点击“立即同步”，以安装任何可用的升级。
translation.reference: 同步完成后，再次点击“立即同步”，以安装可用的升级。

translation.en: Please let me know if you can download and open your book now
translation.zh: 如果您现在可以下载并打开图书了，请告诉我一声
translation.source: Please let me know if you can download and open your book now
translation.medium: 請告訴我你現在是否可以下載和開啟你的書
translation.reference: 如果您现在可以下载并打开图书了，请告诉我一声

translation.en: Hi, are you still there?
translation.zh: 嗨，您还在吗？
translation.source: Hi, are you still there?
translation.medium: 你还在吗？
translation.reference: 嗨，您还在吗？

translation.en: We haven't heard from you.
translation.zh: 我们没有收到您的回复。
translation.source: We haven't heard from you.
translation.medium: 我们没有听到你的消息。
translation.reference: 我们没有收到您的回复。

translation.en: We may have gotten disconnected.
translation.zh: 我们联系不上了。
translation.source: We may have gotten disconnected.
translation.medium: 我们可能已经断开连接了。
translation.reference: 我们联系不上了。

translation.en: I will be ending this chat session.
translation.zh: 我将结束本次聊天。
translation.source: I will be ending this chat session.
translation.medium: 我要结束这次聊天会话了。
translation.reference: 我将结束本次聊天。

translation.en: If you’re looking to get in touch with Customer Care again you can reach us at #URL# and a member of our team will be happy to assist you.
translation.zh: 如果您要再次联系客户服务部门，请访问 #URL#，我们团队随时为您服务。
translation.source: If you’re looking to get in touch with Customer Care again you can reach us at #URL# and a member of our team will be happy to assist you.
translation.medium: 如果您想再次联系客户服务，您可以通过#URL#联系我们，我们的团队成员将乐意为您提供帮助。
translation.reference: 如果您要再次联系客户服务部门，请访问 #URL#，我们团队随时为您服务。

translation.en: For your information, I will be sending you a transcript of our conversation.
translation.zh: 我将把我们的聊天记录发送给您，供您参考。
translation.source: For your information, I will be sending you a transcript of our conversation.
translation.medium: 供您参考，我将给您发送我们谈话的记录。
translation.reference: 我将把我们的聊天记录发送给您，供您参考。

translation.en: Should you have any further questions or concerns, you can always reply back to that email and we will be able to assist you further.
translation.zh: 如果您有任何其他疑问或担忧，您可以随时回复邮件，我们很乐意继续帮助您。
translation.source: Should you have any further questions or concerns, you can always reply back to that email and we will be able to assist you further.
translation.medium: 如果您有任何其他问题或疑虑，您可以随时回复那封电子邮件，我们将会给您提供进一步的帮助。
translation.reference: 如果您有任何其他疑问或担忧，您可以随时回复邮件，我们很乐意继续帮助您。

translation.en: Thank you for contacting #PRS_ORG#, it was my pleasure to assist you today.
translation.zh: 感谢您联系 #PRS_ORG#，很高兴今天能帮到您。
translation.source: Thank you for contacting #PRS_ORG#, it was my pleasure to assist you today.
translation.medium: 谢谢您联系#PRS_ORG#，今天能为您提供帮助我很高兴。
translation.reference: 感谢您联系 #PRS_ORG#，很高兴今天能帮到您。

translation.en: I hope you have an excellent day.
translation.zh: 祝您度过美好的一天。
translation.source: I hope you have an excellent day.
translation.medium: 我希望你有一個美好的一天。
translation.reference: 祝您度过美好的一天。

translation.en: Even if you don't know your password you can create a new password by following the steps I sent.
translation.zh: 即使您忘了密码，也可以按照我发送的步骤创建新密码。
translation.source: Even if you don't know your password you can create a new password by following the steps I sent.
translation.medium: 即使你不知道你的密碼，你也可以按照我發送的步驟創建一個新的密碼。
translation.reference: 即使您忘了密码，也可以按照我发送的步骤创建新密码。

translation.en: But don't worry, I can also send the link to reset your password
translation.zh: 别担心，我还可以发送密码重置链接
translation.source: But don't worry, I can also send the link to reset your password
translation.medium: 但是别担心，我也可以发送重置密码的链接给你。
translation.reference: 别担心，我还可以发送密码重置链接

translation.en: How was the farewell to Etho was like?
translation.zh: 与 Etho 的告别是怎样的？
translation.source: How was the farewell to Etho was like?
translation.medium: 送別伊索的情況如何？
translation.reference: 与 Etho 的告别是怎样的？

translation.en: First of a quick disclaimer: I am not the account user but her wife.
translation.zh: 第一项简单声明：我不是账号使用者，而是他的妻子。
translation.source: First of a quick disclaimer: I am not the account user but her wife.
translation.medium: 先说明一下：我不是这个账户的使用者，而是她的妻子。
translation.reference: 第一项简单声明：我不是账号使用者，而是他的妻子。

translation.en: I have permission to use this account because I just suck at tech and it kind of helps me with mental health issues (and I do see the irony of a technophobe asking about the redstone titan :P)
translation.zh: 我有权使用这个账号，因为我是个技术盲，它在某种程度上可以帮助我疏导心理（我确实看到过一个技术恐惧者询问红石巨人的讽刺段子 :P）
translation.source: I have permission to use this account because I just suck at tech and it kind of helps me with mental health issues (and I do see the irony of a technophobe asking about the redstone titan :P)
translation.medium: 我有权使用这个帐户，因为我对技术一窍不通，而且它有助于我的心理健康问题（我确实看到了一个技术排斥者询问红石泰坦的讽刺意味:P）
translation.reference: 我有权使用这个账号，因为我是个技术盲，它在某种程度上可以帮助我疏导心理（我确实看到过一个技术恐惧者询问红石巨人的讽刺段子 :P）

translation.en: Second and far more important disclaimer: I do not want to stir drama nor suspect something wasn't right.
translation.zh: 第二项，但也更为重要的声明：我不想挑起事端，也不想怀疑有什么不对劲。
translation.source: Second and far more important disclaimer: I do not want to stir drama nor suspect something wasn't right.
translation.medium: 二、更重要的提醒：我不想挑起争议，也不怀疑有什么不对劲。
translation.reference: 第二项，但也更为重要的声明：我不想挑起事端，也不想怀疑有什么不对劲。

translation.en: Afaik it was just a change of wind that didn't suit everyone.
translation.zh: 我想这只是风向的变化，虽然它并不适合所有人。
translation.source: Afaik it was just a change of wind that didn't suit everyone.
translation.medium: 据我所知，只是风向变化不是每个人都习惯的。
translation.reference: 我想这只是风向的变化，虽然它并不适合所有人。

translation.en: I'm just an old fan satisfying a nostalgia streak.
translation.zh: 我只是个怀旧的老粉丝。
translation.source: I'm just an old fan satisfying a nostalgia streak.
translation.medium: 我只是一个满足怀旧欲望的老粉丝。
translation.reference: 我只是个怀旧的老粉丝。

translation.en: With that out of the way >.<...
translation.zh: 把这件事解决了 >.<...
translation.source: With that out of the way >.<...
translation.medium: 那么，接下来><...
translation.reference: 把这件事解决了 >.<...

translation.en: So I used to be a huge Mindcrack fan back in the day.
translation.zh: 我以前是 Mindcrack 的超级粉丝。
translation.source: So I used to be a huge Mindcrack fan back in the day.
translation.medium: 我以前是一个很大的Mindcrack粉丝。
translation.reference: 我以前是 Mindcrack 的超级粉丝。

translation.en: Never missed a release from GuudeBoulderfist, loved the collabs, etc.
translation.zh: 我从未错过 GuudeBoulderfist 发布的内容，对联名款充满狂热等等
translation.source: Never missed a release from GuudeBoulderfist, loved the collabs, etc.
translation.medium: 我从来没有错过GuudeBoulderfist的发行，喜欢他们的合作等等。
translation.reference: 我从未错过 GuudeBoulderfist 发布的内容，对联名款充满狂热等等

translation.en: While watching a random YouTube feed, I came across a vid detailing Etho's channel history.
translation.zh: 在刷 YouTube 时，我看到了一段详细介绍 Etho 频道历史的视频。
translation.source: While watching a random YouTube feed, I came across a vid detailing Etho's channel history.
translation.medium: 当我在随机观看YouTube视频时，我发现了一个关于Etho频道历史的视频。
translation.reference: 在刷 YouTube 时，我看到了一段详细介绍 Etho 频道历史的视频。

translation.en: Near the end, it touched on the Mindcrack going commercial.
translation.zh: 临近结尾时，它提到了 Mindcrack 的商业化。
translation.source: Near the end, it touched on the Mindcrack going commercial.
translation.medium: 在最后，它提到了Mindcrack正在商业化。
translation.reference: 临近结尾时，它提到了 Mindcrack 的商业化。

translation.en: How he didn't see it in positive light and the inevitable refusal to sign the related contracts.
translation.zh: 提到了他不看好这件事，因此拒绝签署相关合同。
translation.source: How he didn't see it in positive light and the inevitable refusal to sign the related contracts.
translation.medium: 他怎么没有以积极的态度看待它，以及不可避免地拒绝签署相关合同。
translation.reference: 提到了他不看好这件事，因此拒绝签署相关合同。

translation.en: Again, neither going 'pro' nor wanting to keep it casual is a wrong decision and I know people go in different directions and such.
translation.zh: 再次强调，追求“专业”或者保持“随意”都不是错误的决定，要知道人各有志。
translation.source: Again, neither going 'pro' nor wanting to keep it casual is a wrong decision and I know people go in different directions and such.
translation.medium: 再次强调，无论是想要职业化还是想要保持随意，都不是错误的决定，我知道人们会朝着不同的方向发展。
translation.reference: 再次强调，追求“专业”或者保持“随意”都不是错误的决定，要知道人各有志。

translation.en: Quick Google led me to this old thread which shows his side of things.
translation.zh: 我在谷歌上搜索了一通，知道了他的一些事情。
translation.source: Quick Google led me to this old thread which shows his side of things.
translation.medium: 快速谷歌搜索让我找到了这个旧的讨论主题，它展示了他的情况。
translation.reference: 我在谷歌上搜索了一通，知道了他的一些事情。

translation.en: Mostly knowing things need to be carefully said, but what strikes most on face value is that you saw things in a different light but overall stayed on good terms.
translation.zh: 大多数人都知道要慎言，但最令人印象深刻的是，你从另一个角度看待事情，同时总体上保持良好的关系。
translation.source: Mostly knowing things need to be carefully said, but what strikes most on face value is that you saw things in a different light but overall stayed on good terms.
translation.medium: 大多数知道的事情需要小心翼翼地说，但最显而易见的是，你以不同的视角看待事物，但总体上仍然保持良好的关系。
translation.reference: 大多数人都知道要慎言，但最令人印象深刻的是，你从另一个角度看待事情，同时总体上保持良好的关系。

translation.en: This whole story happened after I moved on to other things myself, so it's all kind of new to me.
translation.zh: 整个故事都发生在我把兴趣转移到其他方面之后，所以我完全不知道这件事。
translation.source: This whole story happened after I moved on to other things myself, so it's all kind of new to me.
translation.medium: 这整个故事发生在我自己转向其他事情之后，所以对我来说都是新鲜的。
translation.reference: 整个故事都发生在我把兴趣转移到其他方面之后，所以我完全不知道这件事。

translation.en: What I am after is the other side of the picture?
translation.zh: 事情的另一面是什么样？
translation.source: What I am after is the other side of the picture?
translation.medium: 我想要的是另一面的图片？
translation.reference: 事情的另一面是什么样？

translation.en: As I said, my mental health isn't stellar, and seeing an old group I was attached to as a fan parting ways without some dumb explosions that are all too common in the polarized public discourse could be kinda nice and stuff.
translation.zh: 我之前说过，我的心态不是很好，看到我曾经喜欢的一个老团体分道扬镳的时候并没有互撕，可能是一件好事。
translation.source: As I said, my mental health isn't stellar, and seeing an old group I was attached to as a fan parting ways without some dumb explosions that are all too common in the polarized public discourse could be kinda nice and stuff.
translation.medium: 我之前说过，我的心理健康状况不太好，看到我曾经做过粉丝的一个旧组合在极化的公共话语中没有一些愚蠢的爆炸而分道扬镳，可能会是件很好的事情。
translation.reference: 我之前说过，我的心态不是很好，看到我曾经喜欢的一个老团体分道扬镳的时候并没有互撕，可能是一件好事。

translation.en: So how was the response from 'the old gang'?
translation.zh: “老帮派”的反应如何？
translation.source: So how was the response from 'the old gang'?
translation.medium: 那老队友们的反应如何？
translation.reference: “老帮派”的反应如何？

translation.en: Did you keep doing stuff together?
translation.zh: 你们还合作吗？
translation.source: Did you keep doing stuff together?
translation.medium: 你們還一起做事情嗎？
translation.reference: 你们还合作吗？

translation.en: Did you slowly drift apart?
translation.zh: 你们是不是慢慢疏远了？
translation.source: Did you slowly drift apart?
translation.medium: 你們漸漸分開了嗎？
translation.reference: 你们是不是慢慢疏远了？

translation.en: Still chat or invite one another to events?
translation.zh: 还有聊天或邀请对方参加活动吗？
translation.source: Still chat or invite one another to events?
translation.medium: 仍然聊天或邀请彼此参加活动吗？
translation.reference: 还有聊天或邀请对方参加活动吗？

translation.en: Again, I'm not expecting anything dramatic or to see people at each other's throats.
translation.zh: 再说一遍，我不希望发生什么戏剧性的事情或者看到人们互相掐架。
translation.source: Again, I'm not expecting anything dramatic or to see people at each other's throats.
translation.medium: 我又不是期待什么戏剧性的事情，也不希望看到大家互相攻击。
translation.reference: 再说一遍，我不希望发生什么戏剧性的事情或者看到人们互相掐架。

translation.en: Kinda the opposite.
translation.zh: 与此相反，
translation.source: Kinda the opposite.
translation.medium: 相反的。
translation.reference: 与此相反，

translation.en: I guess in a way, a form of low-key closure of something kinda small in my life to reflect a bit of positivity on my own mentally troubled butt.
translation.zh: 低调地结束生命中的一件小事，这多少能映射出我对自己心理问题表现出的积极方面。
translation.source: I guess in a way, a form of low-key closure of something kinda small in my life to reflect a bit of positivity on my own mentally troubled butt.
translation.medium: 我想在某種程度上，對我生活中一些小事情進行一種低調的結束，以便對我自己心理上有些困擾的自己產生一些正面的影響。
translation.reference: 低调地结束生命中的一件小事，这多少能映射出我对自己心理问题表现出的积极方面。

translation.en: P.S. I couldn't help but see the charity fund raiser you had and the buttloads you collected.
translation.zh: 附言：我没有忍住，去看了你的慈善基金募集人，知道你募集到了大量资金。
translation.source: P.S. I couldn't help but see the charity fund raiser you had and the buttloads you collected.
translation.medium: P.S. 我不禁注意到你们举办的慈善募捐活动，以及你们收集到的大量捐款。
translation.reference: 附言：我没有忍住，去看了你的慈善基金募集人，知道你募集到了大量资金。

translation.en: That's awesome as heck!
translation.zh: 真好！
translation.source: That's awesome as heck!
translation.medium: 那太棒了！
translation.reference: 真好！

translation.en: I apologize but we are unable to change the address once it has been placed already.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉，但下单后，我们就无法改地址了。
translation.source: I apologize but we are unable to change the address once it has been placed already.
translation.medium: 抱歉，一旦地址已经设定，我们无法更改。
translation.reference: 我很抱歉，但下单后，我们就无法改地址了。

translation.en: In this case, what I suggest is you can call the rider once he is nearby already for you to be able to amend the address.
translation.zh: 在这种情况下，我的建议是，在骑手到达附近时呼叫骑手，然后就能改地址了。
translation.source: In this case, what I suggest is you can call the rider once he is nearby already for you to be able to amend the address.
translation.medium: 在這種情況下，我建議你可以在騎手附近時打電話給他，以便你能夠修改地址。
translation.reference: 在这种情况下，我的建议是，在骑手到达附近时呼叫骑手，然后就能改地址了。

translation.en: To do this, simply access your order page, tap 'Help and support' and choose the option 'Call rider'.
translation.zh: 只需进入您的订单页面，点击“帮助与支持”，然后选择“呼叫骑手”选项。
translation.source: To do this, simply access your order page, tap 'Help and support' and choose the option 'Call rider'.
translation.medium: 要做到这一点，只需访问您的订单页面，点击“帮助和支持”，然后选择“联系骑手”选项。
translation.reference: 只需进入您的订单页面，点击“帮助与支持”，然后选择“呼叫骑手”选项。

translation.en: did you sign out and sign in on your app?
translation.zh: 您从 App 注销并登录了吗？
translation.source: did you sign out and sign in on your app?
translation.medium: 你在你的应用程序上登出并登录了吗？
translation.reference: 您从 App 注销并登录了吗？

translation.en: did you do the 2 procedures?
translation.zh: 这两个过程都完成了吗？
translation.source: did you do the 2 procedures?
translation.medium: 你做了这两个程序了吗？
translation.reference: 这两个过程都完成了吗？

translation.en: if you did both procedures and didn't solve the issue I can refund the money to your Store Credit account.
translation.zh: 如果这两个过程都执行了，仍然不能解决问题，我可以向您的 Store Credit 帐户退款。
translation.source: if you did both procedures and didn't solve the issue I can refund the money to your Store Credit account.
translation.medium: 如果你做了这两个步骤仍然没有解决问题，我可以将钱退还到你的商店信用账户。
translation.reference: 如果这两个过程都执行了，仍然不能解决问题，我可以向您的 Store Credit 帐户退款。

translation.en: that way you can buy the book of your choice immedialtrely.
translation.zh: 这样您可以立即购买自己选择的图书。
translation.source: that way you can buy the book of your choice immedialtrely.
translation.medium: 那樣你可以立刻買到你想要的書。
translation.reference: 这样您可以立即购买自己选择的图书。

translation.en: would that be okay
translation.zh: 这样可以吗
translation.source: would that be okay
translation.medium: 可以吗？
translation.reference: 这样可以吗

translation.en: are you there?
translation.zh: 您还在吗？
translation.source: are you there?
translation.medium: 你在那里吗？
translation.reference: 您还在吗？

translation.en: for quality purposes i will have to release this chat if there is no interaction in the next 2 minutes
translation.zh: 如果您在接下来的 2 分钟内没有回应，为了提高服务质量，我将结束本次聊天
translation.source: for quality purposes i will have to release this chat if there is no interaction in the next 2 minutes
translation.medium: 为了质量的目的，如果在接下来的2分钟内没有互动，我将不得不释放这次聊天。
translation.reference: 如果您在接下来的 2 分钟内没有回应，为了提高服务质量，我将结束本次聊天

translation.en: Thank you for contacting #PRS_ORG#, it was my pleasure to assist you today.
translation.zh: 感谢您联系 #PRS_ORG#，很高兴今天能帮到您。
translation.source: Thank you for contacting #PRS_ORG#, it was my pleasure to assist you today.
translation.medium: 谢谢您联系#PRS_ORG#，今天能为您提供帮助我很高兴。
translation.reference: 感谢您联系 #PRS_ORG#，很高兴今天能帮到您。

translation.en: I hope you have an excellent day.
translation.zh: 祝您度过美好的一天。
translation.source: I hope you have an excellent day.
translation.medium: 我希望你有一個美好的一天。
translation.reference: 祝您度过美好的一天。

translation.en: The VP−730 is a 9−input scaler/switcher for analog video, digital video, balance stereo and S/PDIF audio signals.
translation.zh: VP-730 是一个 9 路输入的缩放器/切换器，用于模拟视频、数字视频、平衡立体声和 S/PDIF 音频信号。
translation.source: The VP−730 is a 9−input scaler/switcher for analog video, digital video, balance stereo and S/PDIF audio signals.
translation.medium: VP-730 是一款9路輸入的模擬視頻、數字視頻、平衡立體聲和S/PDIF音頻信號的比例縮放/切換器。
translation.reference: VP-730 是一个 9 路输入的缩放器/切换器，用于模拟视频、数字视频、平衡立体声和 S/PDIF 音频信号。

translation.en: It up− or down−scales composite, s−Video (Y/C), component video (YUV), HDMI, computer graphics video and JPEG files to a selectable computer graphics video or HDTV output resolution on identical outputs − one HDMI and two 15−pin HD.
translation.zh: 它可在相同的输出（一路 HDMI 和两路 15 针高清）中将合成视频、s−视频 (Y/C)、分量视频 (YUV)、HDMI、计算机图形视频和 JPEG 文件缩放到一个可选择的计算机图形视频或 HDTV 输出分辨率。
translation.source: It up− or down−scales composite, s−Video (Y/C), component video (YUV), HDMI, computer graphics video and JPEG files to a selectable computer graphics video or HDTV output resolution on identical outputs − one HDMI and two 15−pin HD.
translation.medium: 它可以将复合、S-视频（Y/C）、组件视频（YUV）、HDMI、计算机图形视频和JPEG文件缩放到可选的计算机图形视频或HDTV输出分辨率，在相同的输出上 - 一个HDMI和两个15-pin HD。
translation.reference: 它可在相同的输出（一路 HDMI 和两路 15 针高清）中将合成视频、s−视频 (Y/C)、分量视频 (YUV)、HDMI、计算机图形视频和 JPEG 文件缩放到一个可选择的计算机图形视频或 HDTV 输出分辨率。

translation.en: It includes a power amplifier to drive loudspeakers.
translation.zh: 它包括一个用于驱动扬声器的功率放大器。
translation.source: It includes a power amplifier to drive loudspeakers.
translation.medium: 它包括一個功率放大器來驅動揚聲器。
translation.reference: 它包括一个用于驱动扬声器的功率放大器。

translation.en: The unit provides glitch−free switching between sources through FTBTM (fade−thru−black) switching technology.
translation.zh: 该装置通过 FTBTM（淡入淡出）切换技术实现源间无故障切换。
translation.source: The unit provides glitch−free switching between sources through FTBTM (fade−thru−black) switching technology.
translation.medium: 该单元通过FTBTM（淡入淡出）切换技术，可以在源之间无毛刺地切换。
translation.reference: 该装置通过 FTBTM（淡入淡出）切换技术实现源间无故障切换。

translation.en: HQV® Video Processing - HQV (Hollywood Quality Video) processing represents the state−of−the−art in video processing technology, with the highest quality de−interlacing (with 3:2 & 2:2 pull down), noise reduction, and scaling performance for both standard−definition and high−definition signals.
translation.zh: HQV® 视频处理 - HQV（好莱坞质量视频）处理代表了视频处理技术的最高水平，具有最高质量的去隔行（3:2 和 2:2 下拉）、降噪，以及标准清晰度和高清晰度信号的缩放性能。
translation.source: HQV® Video Processing - HQV (Hollywood Quality Video) processing represents the state−of−the−art in video processing technology, with the highest quality de−interlacing (with 3:2 & 2:2 pull down), noise reduction, and scaling performance for both standard−definition and high−definition signals.
translation.medium: HQV®视频处理 - HQV（好莱坞质量视频）处理代表了最先进的视频处理技术，拥有最高质量的去隔行（3:2和2:2拉伸）、噪声减少和标准定义和高清信号的缩放性能。
translation.reference: HQV® 视频处理 - HQV（好莱坞质量视频）处理代表了视频处理技术的最高水平，具有最高质量的去隔行（3:2 和 2:2 下拉）、降噪，以及标准清晰度和高清晰度信号的缩放性能。

translation.en: Fade-Thru-Black (FTBTM) Switching - The video fades to black and then the new input fades from black for smooth, glitch−free switching.
translation.zh: 淡入淡出 (FTBTM) 切换 - 视频渐黑，然后新输入渐显，实现平滑的无故障切换。
translation.source: Fade-Thru-Black (FTBTM) Switching - The video fades to black and then the new input fades from black for smooth, glitch−free switching.
translation.medium: 淡入淡出（FTBTM）切换 - 视频淡入黑色，然后新输入从黑色淡出，实现平滑、无故障的切换。
translation.reference: 淡入淡出 (FTBTM) 切换 - 视频渐黑，然后新输入渐显，实现平滑的无故障切换。

translation.en: The output signal provides constant sync so the display never glitches.
translation.zh: 输出信号提供持续同步，所以显示始终不会出现故障。
translation.source: The output signal provides constant sync so the display never glitches.
translation.medium: 輸出信號提供持續同步，因此顯示永不出錯。
translation.reference: 输出信号提供持续同步，所以显示始终不会出现故障。

translation.en: K-IIT XLTM Picture-in-Picture Image Insertion Technology - Ultra stable picture−in−picture, picture−and−picture, and split screen capability.
translation.zh: K-IIT XLTM 图中图插入技术 - 超稳定的图中图、图带图和分屏能力。
translation.source: K-IIT XLTM Picture-in-Picture Image Insertion Technology - Ultra stable picture−in−picture, picture−and−picture, and split screen capability.
translation.medium: K-IIT XLTM 图像画中画插入技术 - 超稳定的画中画、画面混合和分屏功能。
translation.reference: K-IIT XLTM 图中图插入技术 - 超稳定的图中图、图带图和分屏能力。

translation.en: Any video source can be inserted into or positioned next to a computer graphics video source or vice versa with window positioning and sizing controls.
translation.zh: 使用窗口定位和大小控件，可将任何视频源插入到计算机图形视频源中或放置在其旁边，反之亦然。
translation.source: Any video source can be inserted into or positioned next to a computer graphics video source or vice versa with window positioning and sizing controls.
translation.medium: 任何视频源都可以通过窗口定位和大小控制插入或放置在计算机图形视频源旁边，反之亦然。
translation.reference: 使用窗口定位和大小控件，可将任何视频源插入到计算机图形视频源中或放置在其旁边，反之亦然。

translation.en: Video Inputs - 2 universal video each on 3 BNC (composite, s−Video, component), 4 computer graphics/component video (15−pin HD), 2 HDMI and 1 USB (for JPEG data).
translation.zh: 视频输入 - 每 3 个 BNC 上 2 路通用视频（复合视频、s−视频、分量视频），4 个计算机图形/分量视频（15 针高清)，2 个 HDMI 和 1 个 USB（用于 JPEG 数据）。
translation.source: Video Inputs - 2 universal video each on 3 BNC (composite, s−Video, component), 4 computer graphics/component video (15−pin HD), 2 HDMI and 1 USB (for JPEG data).
translation.medium: 视频输入 - 每个3 BNC（复合、S-视频、组件）有2个通用视频，4个计算机图形/组件视频（15英寸HD），2个HDMI和1个USB（用于JPEG数据）。
translation.reference: 视频输入 - 每 3 个 BNC 上 2 路通用视频（复合视频、s−视频、分量视频），4 个计算机图形/分量视频（15 针高清)，2 个 HDMI 和 1 个 USB（用于 JPEG 数据）。

translation.en: HDCP Compliant - The HDCP (High Definition Content Protection) license agreement allows copy−protected data on the HDMI input to pass only to the HDMI output.
translation.zh: 与 HDCP 兼容 - HDCP（高清内容保护）许可协议允许 HDMI 输入端的拷贝保护数据只传递到 HDMI 输出端。
translation.source: HDCP Compliant - The HDCP (High Definition Content Protection) license agreement allows copy−protected data on the HDMI input to pass only to the HDMI output.
translation.medium: HDCP 符合標準 - HDCP（高清內容保護）授權協議允許將 HDMI 輸入上的受保護資料僅傳輸到 HDMI 輸出。
translation.reference: 与 HDCP 兼容 - HDCP（高清内容保护）许可协议允许 HDMI 输入端的拷贝保护数据只传递到 HDMI 输出端。

translation.en: Multiple Aspect Ratio Selections - 4x3 or 16x9, anamorphic, letterbox, and user definable settings.
translation.zh: 多宽高比选择 - 4x3 或 16x9、变形、上下黑边和用户自定义设置。
translation.source: Multiple Aspect Ratio Selections - 4x3 or 16x9, anamorphic, letterbox, and user definable settings.
translation.medium: 多种宽高比选择 - 4x3 或 16x9，变形，信封，以及用户可定义的设置。
translation.reference: 多宽高比选择 - 4x3 或 16x9、变形、上下黑边和用户自定义设置。

translation.en: Companion AFV (Audio-Follow-Video) - For every analog video input, supports embedded audio on the 2 HDMI inputs and outputs.
translation.zh: Companion AFV（影音相随）- 对于每个模拟视频输入，支持 2 路 HDMI 输入和输出上的嵌入音频。
translation.source: Companion AFV (Audio-Follow-Video) - For every analog video input, supports embedded audio on the 2 HDMI inputs and outputs.
translation.medium: 陪伴AFV（音频跟随视频）- 支持每个模拟视频输入的嵌入式音频，在2个HDMI输入和输出上。
translation.reference: Companion AFV（影音相随）- 对于每个模拟视频输入，支持 2 路 HDMI 输入和输出上的嵌入音频。

translation.en: Audio Inputs - 6 balanced or S/PDIF audio (each selectable) on terminal blocks, one for each of the 2 universal video and 4 computer graphics video inputs.
